column3: Yisasia tagaife huno fali-mainea yafe hau ayamopafima haiya yana taveligeta tagaya ago havimainonafe tagaya ania huta Yisasima taveli-mainea kavala nelafu-gamina amaya hisuna yafe falisune.

Anumaya Kotima amakinagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea yafe ala imu kigahe nehae. Ani imu kisaya kanaamimoa aupa hugahe nehigeno Yisasia ma agesa havimaine “Ma mopa atalena Nenafatega visua kanamoa ago evayi nehie.” huno nehuno mukia kanalema ma mopale maineyama agai kema nehaviya veamogamifena tusiya huno hau ayamopafi nehaino agola haume haume haino mo fali-maine.

Fotia (40) kafufina Anumaya Kotia tagamife aipa kafa hemateneane? Anumaya Kotia mukia Isaleli veamoya kame kotega kefo yama huteya faligeno amaugafamoa ani kame kotegama hanea veaneahe aipa kafa humateneane.
Tamakaya nafanemoya kema haviya akave nemalaya kava hutama maiho. Yisasi kema ohavinaya kanafina tamaugafa age tamahaye nehaya kavala hutama mainagi menia mani auava yapina nagoene maitama ohaiho.
Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogamina kalagi aimatesiafe hagoteno mukia veala agai kema akave omalaya yateti nofila humatene.

Alilino mainegena neagena havuana foa (4) hamaimuene anagapiti nago agema aigena havua agemoa mage huno hie “Nago kanomoa nagoke yupa nate aepa heno aliyana alime alime visiaamo unema hano hisigeya amisaya miyateti tole osi keayopi laisimo alaga fako huka amamio. Ani avamete miyana kamisageka sikisia (6) maya ania huka amamio. Ania huka amamigananagi olivi yosama hanea yosamo alagafiti masavema nealiya yosayagaene nofi alagamo timaa aliya tatiteya nenaya nofiene alika haviyana ohuo.” huno hie.
Anumaya Koti aufina Havi veane mainone. hutama maisayana tamavalesaga huno Ala veane maiho. huno hu-lamategahie.

Anumaya Kotia mukia ma mopale veamogamina fatago huno kaiyekema humatesia kanafina ago hapalino ani kaiyekelema yagaisia vemona ago ali hetitene. Ani vemofe “Veamoya havilama huya havisae.” huno fali-mainefitila ali hetitene huno humaine.

Amiteya ati vayamoya avetanafa nofiteti tumano kula talo huteya anute vai-teteya ala kava kanomo fai-nealia augafa haesa kena vai-teneya Yisasima he-tino mainele eya Yisasifena “Felugae. Yuta vayamogami ala sauve kanomogae.” huya nehuya augosafi amayateti ainagolapeya nehaeya hu-mainae.
Yauva keto anemoya alu ve aliteya nafaneami neamateya kanaleya huya kava yagai-maisaya yafe nagaila nenahaiye. Ania hisageya kame vayatimoya havigea tagaila hu otatesae.

Nagaya Nenafa aguafi maugeno ania huno Nenafaa nagaila naguafina maigetaa hu-mainoema hunama hua kea havitama tamakupina maletama tamametiti hiho. Mani kema ohavinutama tamakaya mukia aliyama ali-mainoa aliyama age-mainesayana nagaifena havitama tamakuafi ali maletama tamametiti hiho.

Kaiyekea humateteno mukia veamogami amakimoa maige maige hisaya hamaimuma hanea veamogami amaki hanea avopima amakima okaenesaya veala Anumaya Kotia atama tegelege nehia komufi amavaleno hagayu huma-talegahie. Fali yaene fali veamoya unemaiya koene ata tegelege nehia komufi anasaga huno vai-talesigeana hano hutafa hugae. Ani atama nelea komufima visayana tole (2) yupa eteya faligahae.

Kalaisia kafuahe kafuahema amileasina mukia kanafina ehema Anumaya Kotia ma mopama talo humalenea kanaleti aepa heno augafa agata aino falige falige hileasinagi. Aao menia ma mopama hano hisia kanamoa aupa nehigeno Kalaisia nagoke kana kanoale ma mopafina falote huno tagaila kefo yatima ali-talesia yafe agaia fali-maine.
Amavaleno vigeya fotia (40) kafu amakaiene kame kotega umaineno veganokano kavama haya kavaamihe mailama huno maineno yagaino maine.
Nafunagana-gatama naa humaineafe Anumayamo kavema negahena melitalu hutetama kanaleya hutama nagoa veafena amakava mainegeya mukiamoya esagetama nagopi tamakoya aye-mainetama ani kavela neho.

Huteno Sipi sipi nafanemoa sikisia (6) molia menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea fukina melino hakao higena agoana tusia imi aligeno yagemoa asu huno hanimaage higeno ikamoa haesa ko tino kola kana humaine.

Nagoa anemoya Anumayamofe haviya amametiti humainaya yafe vayaamima faliyana Anumaya Kotia fali-mainafitila ali hetimategeya eteya amavale-mainae. Kame vayamoya nagoamo-gamina nehamaeya mage huya hae Anumaya Kotina tamakavenoma hutesayana otamahaeta afaa tama-talesunagetama notamilega ugahae. huya hayanagi mage hae Tamahaoteyatamigi tahaesageta faliteta haenaga hetita kanaleya huta maigahune. huya hageya hamayageya fali-mainae.

Higeno Poloa ati vayafe mage huno hamapaiye. “Taagaya Lomu kanolata mainoagi haviya hulaateya taagai kaiyekea haviteya fatago huya kaiyekea huotaateya vea amaulagafina hegi kayoteti tusiya huya taamulonalo huteya nofila hulaatenagi menia naa higeya falakiya taatalegahe nehae? Tamagelafa hutaa kesila ougahuagi amakaya amakaiami male eya ‘Kina nopitila ataletana vio.’ huya hulaatesae.” huno humaine.

E, kahegi kemoa mage humaine, Kumai he kavala ohuo. Veala haegeno ofalino. Musufa yana ohuo. Alu kanomo kuafenotela ageka kahayea ohuo huno nagoa kene humainegi mukia kahegi kemona aepaamoa nagoke mage huno hane, kagaika kaugafahema kahaiya avamete mukia veamogami amaugafahena kahaino huno humaineane.
Ani yafe mukia veamoya Yisasima esigeya agesaya yafe amametitia nehuya amakua sese huge huge nehuya Yisasia kefo kavama ohuno agupima oniya yama omalenea kava huya kanale kavaage huya maisae.
Naguamoa Anumaya Koti haiya kavafena nehaiye.
Mukia kanafina Anumayatimote ailokaetama mainetama muse hiho. Nagoene mani kea nehue musena hiho.
Higena kema nahapaiya kanoma agesuafene huna maiyahae huna agoana sevenia (7) lamua kanileta yafateti talo humale lamua hanegena age-mainoe.
Anumaya Kotia tagamife agaia lokiyaage kea huno Nagaila maifalu hisaya yaniafina agola uomaigahae. huno hu-maineane? Ani kema atagae-mainaya veafe hu-maineane.
Mainoanagi hagoteyama emainaya vayala vayama nehamaeya musufa yama nehaya vayalagiya sipi sipiyagamoya kema haya kea ohavinae.

Tamakaya nofipi mainetama miya oali aliyama nealiya veamogatama aluya hutama kava kanotamimo agia alisaga nehutama amakai amaiyaafinaga maiho. Ako huno kanale kava hu nelamatesia kava kanoene havi kava kanoene hisaya kea akave maleho.
Uteya nagoa havigema nehaya vayala amavaleya hetimatageya ani vayamoya mage hae “Mani kanomoa mukia yupa tagaila alu aotage mono notiene kahegi kene huno haviya hie.

Anumaya Kotia agaia ani yamona aepaa maineanagino agaienena kame vayaa mainonageno Kalaisina hutegeno eaamo Anumaya Kotiene melino taipa falu hulategeta agaiene nago taipale mainone. Mainonageno Anumaya Kotia “Nagoa veamogamina ani kavala humategahue.” huno humaineafe tagaya amaipa alita agaiene falu humatesuna aliyamaa tagaila lamine.

Nafunagana-gatama nayona Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogamina Anumayamo agile kea huhaleya hamanepaigeya ani kema nehaviya veamoya amakaila ali haviya hu-matayanagi amamena malelava huya mainayane. Tamakaya ania hutama ani ka kanoale akave hutama vaiyeho.
Efalotema hinageya mukia veamoya Anumayamo agi neayeya ‘Kalagi ailato.’ huya nehisageno Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena aligatigahie.” huno kae-maleneane.

“Tamage Anumaya Kotia mukia muse hisia yana alisie. Tokiyaage hale yamaaene agia haneanagino kanale havi haviyamaa hanea kano maineafe agia alisaga nehuta tusia muse hutesune. Agaia kava yagaisia tokiyaamoa agola hanege hanege huno hanesie. Tamage.” huya humainae.
Tamakaya amega ko tamaugafale hu-lisaya yafena musena ohiho. Tamayolagefafi vaili yaene sesu konagalima ali yatamiene kenama fai-lisaya yafeenena nelagafi notagafi hutama musena ohiho.

Anumayatimo ke huka falote hisana yafena kagayea ohinageka kolia ohuo. Nagaya keama huna falote nehugeya kina nopi natenaya yafena kagayea ohuo. Anumaya Kotia tokiyaa kaminegeka Yisasina kanale keama hana yafe kagaima kana yama kamisageka nakaiene tokaetaa aligahue.
Nagi tamage huya amaku amamemaamona kagaila kamisaya yafe nagaya nagu namemaamona kagaila negamue.
Faligahe hayanagi tamauma fae-maiya yana neataletama hetitama kanale auava yatamia ali lokiya vaiho. Nagaya agoana auava yatamimoa Anumayaniamo aufina fatago ohunae.
Falutigeno anile tagufa (3) molia ensole kanomoa yopaafima hanea yana ala tima nelavia tipiene kapaima nehagea tipiene taki-talegeno ani liyagamoa kolamaage ti hapae-maine.
Yisasi Kalaisia agaia hulatenea yateti ka valilategeta Anumaya Kotina kayone yamaafi umaineta Anumaya Kotina tokiya hale yamaafi mo lokaeta maisunafe tametitia huta musena nehune.

Tamakaya ago havimainae amo augafale mai vayaene aguamoa oniyaage humai veanene alu kanomo yafe age haye hisaya veanene afa yafe Anumayati maine. huya agisana vaiya amakua neamiya Anumaya Kotina amakua oamisaya kava nehuya ani veamoya Anumaya Kotiene Kalaisiene kavama yagai-mainaa kumatela ovisaya kava nehayafe ougahae.

Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufena mage huno humaine Kumakaa neataleka kamisua mopalega vuo. huno higeno Apalahamua ani mopalegama visia kamona oageneanagi Anumayamo kea havino agupi maleno ametiti huteno akave maleno hetino umaine.
Havili netama anegi-nagia ohiho. Naa augafa kavamoa lamakaila alino haviya hulamategahigi tamakaya Alu Aotage Avamuamona avalegeno tamakupina hiya hino.
Amakaya amaugafa amakeya hamaye hisaya yaamia maiya nehayanagiya mukia veamoya aniama hisaya kavala ageteya akave maleya kelamage kema hisaya kemona ali haviya hu-talegahae.
Kalaisia hulatenea yateti tagaya tole nofi veanea mainonageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa Nelafatega visuna katia ago vali-latene.

Yuta vea omainaya veama Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya veamogamife tagaya nayona avona kaeta huhaya gi-malenona kea mage huta humainone ‘Fali-mainaya veafe amakisana vaiya atupa kave alisaga huya malesaya kavela oneho. Kolamoa agusafinaga hanesia afuene kolaenena oneho. Ane munane amavayu nehisaya yana ataleho.’ huta ago avona kaeta hamapai-mainone.” huya humainae.

Amamianagi Pitaa agaifena mage hie “Ananaiyasigae Satania kefo kagu kagesa kamigeka kagaya ‘Mukia monea mama hane.’ huka nehanagi nagoa monea ali fala-negika Alu Aotage Avamumofena havige huka ayevataga nehane.

Maisunana tagaya nagoene osi nafane kana huta omainona yafe taipafi ayegesaya vaya eya havige huya ayelavataga hisaya kea ohavigetao. Ani havigeage vayamoya yasimo alino neea augafa kea aliya neagi havigu ani yasimo kemoa yasimoma hia kava huno tavaleno atifi mafi ohisigeta ko huta Kalaisi kana veane maisune.

Kefo yama nehaya veala Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kumatela ohaigahae huno humainea kea ohavinao? Ani kehena havilama hutetama havige hisaya kea ohaviho. Ani kefo yama nehaya veala Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kumatela ohaigahae moli huliteya nehuya kumai nehaya veanene ago fali-mainaya vayafe “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana nevaiya veanene alu kanomo anema amavayu nehaya vayaene ve amafaluyaene moli nehaya vayaene Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumatela ougahae.

Yisasi kema havigahema tafu-taganayaene melitaluma nehuna yana oatalesune. Nagoa veamoya ago atalenayanagi tagaya oatalesune. Yisasia eteno kaiyekema me hulatesia kanamoa ago aupa hu-mainegi melitalu hutama Tamaku tamamena ali lokiya vaitama maiho. huta hamapaisune.

Tokiyaage hale yamaafi umaisaya yafe ma mopafi kefo yama nehaya yayaga hamaetama hano hiho. Maa auavafe nehue munanene anene kumai he yane. Tamaugafamoa oniyaage nehia kefo yane. Augafa haga neyane. Age lamahaye nehaya yane. Alu kanomo yate age lamahaye nehaya yamoa ago fali-mainaya veamogamife “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana vaiya amaku amisaya avamete huno Anumaya Kotina amaku oaminaya avamete kava nehie.

Nehagi tagayama yagelema mainona veala tagu tagesale kava yagaisune. Yisasife havita tagupi maleneta tametiti nehuna yaene nagoa anagatimogamife tahau tayamopafi nelahaisia yaene auvai-latesia yana alita aye hailita maisune. Anumaya Kotia tagu tamema aligatisia yafe tametiti huta tanutela tokiyaage tumano ku vailisune.
Anumaya Kotima laminea Avamumoa koli hisuna tagu tagesa notamiafe tagaya tokiya yamaaene kanaleya huta veanea tagua neamamita tagu tagesalema kava yagaisuna tokiya ago tamine.
Nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotina tagua amitafa hu-mainone. huya nehuya Anumaya Koti kahegi kea akave omalesayana havigeage veane mainageno kelamage kemoa amakuafina omalene.
Naama hayana nagaila muse yanimoa alama hisiafena nagoke tamaku tamakesale maiho. Nagoamogamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaisigeya amakaya ania huya tamakaifena hamaisie.
Higeya agaila atafa hugahe hayanagi falisia kanaa yaufa falote ohunea yafe augafalela nago kanomoa atafa ohune.
Mukia kuafenoamima hanesia veamoya kanale kava nehuya vayamogamina monene amaya hisae. Vayaamimofe hamau humateya vaya kaikai vea maisae.
Higeya kenonaa mage huya hapaiye “Mani kanomoma kefo kavama ohuneleasipa avaleta kagaitela omoteasine.” huya hae.

Nago tamafu-tamakanaa agesa haviteno “Nagoke kanama mauna yamoa nagoa kanamona agase-maineanagita ani kanalekeya alitalu huta Anumayamo agia alisaga hugahune.” huno hisia kanomoa Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisiafe ani kavala nehie. Nago tamafu-tamakanaa “Mukia kavela negahue.” huno hisiana Anumayamotega nunamu huno muse hutenea yafenagino Anumayamo agia alisaga humainegi nago tamafu-tamakanaa afumo amema monesia kanomoa “Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hugahue.” huno monesie. Agaienena Anumaya Kotitega nunamu huno muse huno havinege.
Muse nehutama Anumayamoma hulatesia yafena tamametiti hutama agava maiho. Kana yama falote hisigetama hetitama tokiya vaiho. Mukia kanafina Anumayamotega havige havige hutama maiho.

Huteno ati vayate kava neyagaiya kanomofe ke higeno egeno mage hie “Polona avaleka nofi nopina mo hutegananagi tokiyaage huka nofila hu oateka atalenegeya nefuya kavela afaa memiya aya hisae.” huno humaine.
Veafe hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya veamoya haviya humatesaya veamogamina oamatalegahagi Anumayamo amaya hisiafe amametiti nehuya agava maineya mai lokiya vaiya nemaiye.

Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane “Tamage nehie huna havina nagupi malena nametiti hu-mainoafe mani kea huhalena nehue.” huno higeya kae-malenayane. Tagaya ania huta “Anumayamoa lamage nehie.” huta tagupi malenonafe mani kea huhaleta nehune.

Nafunagana-gatama nagaya tamakaifena hu lokiya vaina tamahapauve aliyama oaliya haviguma nemaiya veafena tamakaya Naa hutama aliyana aliho. hutama humateho. Kolima nehaya veala Kolia ohiho. hutama amakua alitama oya humateho. Lokiyaamima omalesia veala amaya hiho. Mukia veamogamina ako hutama alilava hutama amateho.

Ohageno faefu (5) molia ensole kanomoa yopaafima hanea yana kefo afai afumo siale taki-talegeno mukia ani kefo afai afumoma kava humatenea kaiyaga tusia hani kigeya agai veamoya amaugafa amakatama aiya yafe amakaiami amavefunafi hataga hatago huya akafula ani-mainae.
Ani kema ali hipoya hisaya veala Isaleli veanelafa mainageno Anumaya Kotia amaipa falu hisia yaene kayone humatesia yaene amamisie huna nehue.
Apolosia Anumayamo kea havilama hulineno aya mukiki huno kanale kavaage nehuno Yisasifena hamapaiyanagi Yonia tima falematenea yafeke havilinegi Yisasi agile ti falemate kavafena ohavine.
Kave nesao aliya alisao mukia yama hinutamahena Anumayamo agia alisaga hisaya yafeke hiho.

Kaovanagi Anumaya Koti Alu Aotage Avamumona tamamineanagitama tamakaya ago avalageno tamakupi mainegi havigu alu kanomo havi ya tamave-liyafenagi Alu Aotage Avamumoa mukia yafena tamav nelino tamageage hugahianagino havigea ohugahie. Hulamavema-nelia yafena Yisasiene aigamaetama maiho.

Nagoa veamoya amaku nafaneamia atalageya Ago fali-mainae. huta nehunanagi nagoa veamoya Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti hu-mainone. huya nehayanagi kanale aliyaamima falote ohisiana amakupi malenaya yamoa ago faliteno afa ya kana humaine.
Mani kea nehuno maya alino amaulagale Anumayamotega muse nunamu huno havigeteno kolino nemaine.

Avo kaeta ‘Mage hutama hiho.’ huta hamapaisune ‘Fali-mainaya veafe ‘Anumayati mainae.’ huya amakisana nevaiya malenesaya kavela onesae. Ane munane amavayu nehisaya kavala ataleho. Kolamoa agusafinaga hanesia afuene kolaenena oneho.’ huta hamapaisune.

Higeno Poloa agaifena mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya nagaifena ‘Haeho.’ huka nehananagi Anumaya Kotia kagaila kahaegahie. Kagaya haviya hia kegiyamo agupile efe peni fale-malenea kana augafa kava nehuka kaguafina havi omaleka amegati savale kanomogae. Kagaya kahegi kefiti kaiyeke hunategahe nehuka ‘Haeho huka nehananagi ani kea ali neatagayane.” huno humaine.
Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainona veamogata Anumaya Kotia nagola kaiyekea hulateno kefo yama humainona anonaa otamigahie.
Tagaya Anumaya Kotia hai vaisia ya alisuna yafene huno huyo okinegi Yisasi Kalaisia tagu tamema aligatisia yafene huno Anumaya Kotia tagaila huyogi-malene.

Hati-lavino visiaamo mukia mopaene mopaene mainaya veamo-gami amakia Kogi nofi veanene Magogi nofi veanene Satania havige huno aye-mavataga hisiaamo “Melitalu hutama tu hiho.” huno amavaleno melitalu hu-matesigeya ani veamogami napamoa ti kahaepa kana hu-maineanagiya huyo okigahae.

Tamakaila nagoatamimoya nayona ani avamete kefo ya nehageno Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi agiletiene Anumaya Koti Avamutetiene kefo yatamia ago aye hami-talegetama alu aotage veane maigeno Anumaya Koti aufina “Fatago veane mainae.” huno alino kanale hulamatene.

Ani yafe nagaila ali haviya hunatayanagi nagaila lamage huno nagayehena ohuna Anumayamofe havina nagupi malena nametiti humainoa kanomofena ago havilama humainoe. Agaia naminea aliyanagino auvainenateno kanaleya huna alisua yafe Nagaila nahamaegahie. huna nagesa havimainoe. Ani kavala nehinageno Yisasia ikapinagatima eteno elavigahie huna nehue.

Ali lokiya hulinetama Alu Aotage Avamumoene ailokaesageno lamaya hisigetama mukia kanafina nunamuna hutama Anumayamotega havigesaya yafe kava yagaitama mainetama havige havige nehutama Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veafe Hamamao. hutama havigesaya kehe tamakesa havi havi hutama maiho.

Polonagi Sailasiagi Timotiagi tagaya mani avona kaeta Tesalonaika kumatema mainetama Yisasifema havitama tamakupi malenaya veamogatamina kaeta nelamamune. Anumaya Koti, Nelafaene Yisasi Kalaisi, Anumayatimoene tokaetama mainaya veamogatamina mani avona kaeta nelamamune. Anumaya Kotia kayone hisaya yaene tamaipamoa falu tamahaisia yaene tamamisie.
Anumayatimoa ago aupaa egahe nehiafe kayone humate veane mainegeya tamakeho.
Ani mayaene nofi alagamo tiene nenetamahena Anumayatimoa tagaife huno fali-mainea aepaa huhaletama hugahae. Ania hume nevisageno Anumayatimoa eteno esie.”

Havigenuyahena tole amaku amakesa ohaviya Anumaya Kotifema havigesuna yana ago tamigahie. huya amakupi maleneya havigesayana ani kali veamogamina kaliamia alino hano huteno Anumayamoa ali hetimateteno kefo yama hu-mainesaya yama hanesiana Anumaya Kotia aigeamateno atalemategahie.

Nagaila naginagomoya hu-mainaya kava huno naguamoa nahapaigena ani kate neuna Anumaya Koti aliyana nealina nateene felugaene kegeene kagaila kaya hisiafene huna Anumayamotega muse huna nunamuna huna havinegoe.

Fala kiya maineya keha keha huya mukia agoyaheene yafafeene mage huya hae “Tagaya sauvemo siale mainea kanoa Anumaya Koti aule omaisuna tagesa nehune. Sipi sipi nafanemoa tusia hai vai nelategeta koli nehunagi agoyamogatama kofa hu-lavitama tagaila etama aiso hulateho.

Nagi tamakesama hanesimogatama Avamumoa mono notema nevaya veamogamifema hia kea haviho. Satanienema tuma huya agase-mainesaya veamogamina falakino hanea kavela, manae huya nehaya kavela neamamina nagola efeage yafatela hamaote hamaote haegafa amakima kae-malenoa yafana amamisugeya nagoa veamoya ani amakiyaga oagegahagi agaia yafama alisimoa agaiage agegahie.

Ani havigeage kema hu-maveliya vayamoya monea age hamaye huya havigema lamahanepaiya yateti monetamia lamaha-falegahayanagi Anumaya Kotia kaiyekea hu-mateteno ali haviya hu-mateno hanageke ya amamisia yamoa nayona talo tala hu-malegeno aula ofaenegi aulaga ageno amakava-maine.

E, Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya autamafina Yuta veamogatihena mage huya humainayane “Tamakaitamia havi kavama nehaya yatamihena Yuta vea omainaya veamoya tamaketeya Anumaya Koti agihena kamuge hatageya vai neatae.” huno humaine.

Omalageya ani havi vayamoya nayona Isipiti kotega tole kanolatana Yanesiagi Yapalesigania humainaa augafa kava humainae. Ani kanolatana Mosesena aliana havi ya huana anakaveno hutenaa augafa kava huya mani havi amakesa hanea vayamoya kelamage kemona amakaveno huteya Anumayamofena amegati haviya amakupina omalageno Anumayamoa ago ama-taleneane.

Nagaya nayamopafima nahaiya veamoya nagai kema haviya akave malesaya yafena kayo kevea neamamuafe aluya hutama lamakesa nehavitama kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hutama “Nagoene ohugahune.” hutama hiho.

Tagaya Yisasia hulatenea yafema havita tagupi maleta tametiti humainonafe Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulatene. Anumayatimoa, Yisasi Kalaisi, ani kavala hulateneafe Anumaya Koti tokiya hale yapi maigahune.

Kagaikaa maisana auava yakaaene Yisasi kema hamanepaina yaene atale yafenagi kava hume hume haiyo. Aniama hisanana Anumaya Kotia kagai kagu kamena alinegatino kagai kema nehaviya veamogami amaku amamena aligatisigeya kanaleya huya fatago kate ugahae.
Yisasi veamogamina “Kalaisifena kamuge hatagetama vaimateho.” huna nehuna kasagoya mono nopi kayona mo neamamina nahai-vaina Yuta veane omainaya vayamogami kumapina moli-haviya huneamatoane.
Mopale vayamogata atafa lamaku tamakesamo auava yamoa maa humainegi haviho. Moli huliteya nehuya kumai he yane. Amaugafafi oniyaage kefo kavale. Amaugafa haga neya kumai he kava akave male yane.
Naa humainegi avina yama fai-malenea kanomo agiene tima taki falu hu-malenea kanomo agienena omalegi avina yama alino aifalo higeno hage-mainea kanoa, Anumaya Koti agigeya alisaga hisune.

Haneanagi meni kanafina Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisima ikapinagati elavino fufu yatema esiafe tamametitia hutama agava mainageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa tokiya yamaa kasagoya tamamineana-gitama nago yafena aupa nohae.

Nagaya ikapinagati kanale age aiya agea havugeno ti anamoma asaga hu-lavino nelavino agema neaiya kava huno neaino monagemoma hia kava higena havimainogeno kasagoya veamoya gitama neaigeno agema neaiya kava higena havimainoe.

Yisasifena mukia Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya mage huya humainayane “Mukia veamoya agaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisageno agaia agileti kefo yaamia aigeamateno alitalemategahie. huya humainayane.” huno hie.
Nagoa veamoya “Anumaya Kotia muse huno tagia alisaga hisigeta tokiyaaene hale yapi maisune.” huya kanale kava huge huge nehaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula amamigahie.

Hageno Poloa mage huno hie “Yonia mage nehuno tina falematene ‘Kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hisagena tina fale-lamategahue.’ huno nehuno veala mage huno hamapai-maine ‘Nagai nakavelaga esia kanomofe, havitama tamakupi maletama tametiti hiho.’ huno humaineana Yisasife huno humaineane.”

Naa hu-maineanagino meni kanafina Anumaya Koti kema akave nemalaya veanelema kana yama vayi hisigenoa Anumayamoa ani kana yapitila ali amatalegahigi kefo kavama nehaya veala ago neamakeanagino amakata aisia yana amamiteno ala kaiyekema hu-matesia kanahe amatafa hu-lineno amakava maine.

Valeasinagi ani mopahena ohunagi ikapinaga visaya kanale kumafe tusiya huno hamaigeya humaine. Hamaigeya Anumaya Kotifena Anumayatimo maine. huya hageno Anumaya Kotia ani kehena havigeno aipamoa kanale higeno ikapinaga kanale kumaamia talo humatene.
Maigananagi Anumaya Kotina amaku amakesa haviya oaminaya veamoya nehaya manifena aneginagi kema hisaya kea ohavika Anumayamofekeya havika akave maleme maleme haiyo.

Ani veamoya mukia kotega vai neayeya Anumaya Kotina amakua aminaya veamogami kumala, Anumaya Kotia muse nehia ala kumamona meli kagiya amavayagigahayanagi ikapinagati atamoa elavisiaamo ani veamogamina tesagali hano hugahie.
Huteno amakaife mage hie “Yisasi Kalaisi agile tina falelamatesue.” huno hamapaiteno tina falematetegeya mage huya hapaiye “Tagaiene nagoa kana tagaya maigane.” huya humainae.
Kagaya ma kagesa nehavine “Kahegi kemo aepaa havilinogi aulaga asu humai kanomo visia kana aveligahue. Hani yapi mainaya veala ayevasa humategahue.” huka nehano?
Maigahayanagi Kalaisia tagaifena hu lokiya vaino mage humaine Agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula tamamigahue. huno hu lokiya vai-maineane.

Nehaiyanagi nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotitegati kanale amaku amakesa aliteya maa hugahae, Hagote yana amakuafina oniya omale amaku amakesa haviya maigahae. Anile yana nagoamoyaenena nagoke amaku amakesale maigahae. Amaipamoa kanale hinageya nago kanomoma hisia kegeya haviya maineya kalagi aiya kanaleya huya ali kayone humateya mukia veanenena nagoke amaku amakesale maineya amegatila havige havagea aye mavataga ohu veane mainae.
Higeno nefaa nafaneamofena tusia muse nehuno mukia kava yagaisia yana ayapi malene.

Anumayatimoa nagoa veamoya maiya nehaya augafa kava huno vase vase huno hu lokiyama vai-malenea kemotela aliyana noalie. huta nehunagi agaya tagaife agesa nehavino Nagoa veala haniki-mainea yapi tegelege nehia atafina ovisae. huno agesa nehavino Mukiamo-gatama tamakua aiyahae hutama maiho. huno tagaifena ako huno tagava maine.
Nagi nagainige mainena ama oalinoa yama huya mukia vayala maisaya yafe nenahaiyanagi Anumaya Kotia agaia alua lua mai yana nagoke nagokemogatina tamigeta tahaote tahaote auavate nemaune.

Hagotetama veafena tusiya huno tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Anile Alu Aotage Avamumo lamamisia tokiya alisaya yafe musena nehutama tusiya huno tamahaino. Ani tokiya yapiti hagotetama Anumayamoa tamakupima humainea kema huhaletama hisaya tokiyahena tusiya huno tamahaino.

Anumaya Kotia ikaene mopaene talo humaleteno “Hani yapitila halo.” hunoma humainea kanomoa hani yama hanea taguafina aye hale-lategeta maineta Yisasi Kalaisi augosafina Anumaya Koti tokiya hale yamoa hanegeno tave-ligeta age-mainone.

Nagola Yuta kanomo agia Apolosie kuma aepaa Alekasatalia kanogino Efesusi uvayi humaine. Ani kanoa kanaleya huno kea nehavia kanogino maineno Anumaya Koti autamafi hanea kea havilama huno havilinea kanoe.

Naama humainaya avamete huno Yisasia fali-mainea kolateti kefo yati aye hamiteno alu aotage veane maisayafene higeya kegiyamona malaga avaleya agaye hisifa kavala mo hutageno agata neaigeno fali-maine.

Manima hua kea tokiyaage huka veamogamina amaku amakesa alika amakafa hugeya haviya lokiyaage huya akave malesae. Havigu nagoa veamoya kagaife Afa kano mainane. huya hugateyafenagi kagaya tokiyaage huka maiyo.

Anumaya Kotia maa huno tagaifena hau ayamopafina hau-mainea kavala tagaila taveli-maine. Anumaya Kotia agaia nafanea aiya nagoke nafaneamona hutegeno ma mopafina emaine. Emaineafe Yisasima fali-mainea yateti agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula aliteta kanaleya huta maisuna yafe hutegeno emaine.
Nenafagae ma mopama taloma ohunana kanafina nagaifena kahau kayamopafi kahaigekama naminana tokiya hale yania nagaima naminana veamoya agesaya yafe nagaya maisua kumate maisae huna nehue.
Mukia vea aliya haviya nehuya havi no maisaya yamaage neamamiye.

Yisasia ala mono notela hagote kava kanogino, Anumaya Kotiene veamogatiene amunotifi maineno falu hu nelatea kanoa, Anumaya Koti nafanegino ikapinaga hai-maineanagita agaifena tametitima huta hu falote nehuna yana atafa huta tokiya vailisune.

E, Nefaa, Anumaya Kotia, agai agi alisaga huno tokiya hale yamaama aminea kanafina Anumaya Kotia tokiya hale yamaafi maineno Yisasife mage huno hapaiye Mamona nagaila nahaumanafi nahau-mainea nafanegina agaifena aluya huno nenahaiya nafane maine. huno hu-maineane.
Haote haote tokiya nagoke Avamumokeya tamine. Agaia haiya kava huno tahaote tahaote alu lokiya alu lokiya fako huno lamine.

Faligeno fo (4) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena nehigeno yagemoa tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga asu humaine. Ania huya ikana tagufafi (3) ali fako humalageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga ania huno asu humaine. Kanefiyaga tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga ania huno asu humaine. Asu hu-maigeno felugama aye vasa nehia yaamimoa tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago kanafina asu higeno kegela tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago kanafina ikaene kanefiene asu higeno tusia haniki-maine.
Hemanati-talegeya Yuta vayamogami mono note soka kanomona Sosetenesina atafa huya kaiyeke havi kumamo avate aiko-neliyana Kalioa “Aoteyamaae.” nehuno oagene.
Higeya nagoene atafa huya nofi hu-tegahe hayanagi amakaseno ago umaine.
Nagi amega taugafamoa haviya hugahe hianagi mukia kanafina Anumayamoa taipamona alino haegafa hulategeta Anumayamo aliyafena “Kasalo tahae.” huta noatalone.

Mainageno Maliaa nago kilo manaage masave hanea keayola, tusia mone hanea masavemo agia natie nehaya masavena alino Yisasina aiyale taki hano hu-teteno ayolagefaleti ali hau hu-nea-tegeno ani masavemo manamoa ani nopi haino hiya higeya manaa havimainae.

Anumaya Kotima Kamigahue. huno humainea kehena havino ametiti huteno ani mopale umaineno natu veamoya nehaya kava huno kanale nona kino omainegi yugu no kino maine. Anumaya Kotia Na mopa tamamigahue. huno hulokiya vai-malenea mopale nafaneamoa Aisakiene agehoamoa Yekopuene ania huya yugu no kimaleya mainayane.
Nafunagana-gatama haviho mukia nagayama nehua auavanima ageteya akave nemalesaya veamogamina agelama hutama amakave maleho.
Kana yama alisia kanomona aya hutama aliho. Ani kavama hisayana Yisasi Kalaisina haegafa kahegi kea ali hipoya hugahae.

Tamakaya haviho Anumaya Kotia agaifema haviya amakupi maleya ametiti hu-mainaya yafekeya ageteno Fatago veane mainae. huno hu omategahigi kanale aliyaenema ali lokaeya alisayana Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hu-mategahie.
Naa hu-maineanagita naane huta hisune? “Anumaya Kotia fatago ohia kava humaine.” huta hisuno? Aao naa kea ohutafa huta ohugahune.

Nagoa tamafu-tamakanaya Yisasia hulatenea yafena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia “Ago fatago veane mainae.” huno humatenea yafena havilama ohuya “Naa kava hisunageno Anumaya Kotia ‘Fatago veane mainae.’ huno huotategahie.” huya nehaya veala tamakaiene nagopi maisayafe amavaletama amateho. Amategahagi amakaya amakesafiti alu ke hisaya yafena kea vaitama ani keletila tua hu omateho.
Naa higeno ikatela tusia tua falote humaine. Ensolemo-gami kava kanoamimo agia Maikoloe ensole vayayagaene tokaeya havi osifavene agaia Kefo Avamuyagaene tusia tua humainae.
Tamakuamoa tamahai vaisigetama havigu kefo kava hisagi. Tamahai vaisia yamoa ayaayate ani tamahai ya ovaitama havigu yage lavi falesigi aupaa alifalu hiho.

Nagoa veamoya kefo kavama hu-lamatesagetama amakaila anonaamia havi kavala hu oamateho. Kamugema hatageya vai-lamatesagetama amakaila kamugea vai oamatetama Anumayamotega nunamu kefiti ke hutama Kanale yana amamio. hutama nunamu kefiti havigegeno amamino. Alu yafenomagi ani kava hisayafene huno Anumaya Kotia ke higetama umainayanagitama agaitegati kanale manua aligahae.
Nagaima hu-natenegena emainoa Nenafaa nagaiene maineno mukia kanalela agayama musema hia kavama huafenagino nagaila nonatale.” huno hie.

Tamakaya maa hutama hetiho. Amamu nofimaa aye-talako huya kiliya kava hutama Anumaya Koti kelamage kea lokiyaage hutama hulitama maiho. Hamaifiyafalema tokiyaage kapa siota vai-liya kava hutama fatago hisia kavala hulokiyaage hisayana tamakuamona auvaitegahie.

Sevenia (7) lamumoa ani sevenia (7) mono noyagafi Yisasife haviya melitalu nehaya veafe humaine.”

Noagonagi Yisasina agelama hu-mainone. Ensole vayamogami amaiyafinaga Yisasia osia kana kanoa maigeno Anumaya Kotia kayone yamaaleti mukia veamogatihe huno fali-maine. Fali-mainea yateti Anumaya Kotia agia alisaga huno tokiyaage hale yamaa ago amine.
Anumaya Kotina agaima haisia kavama hisaya tamaku tamakesa tamamiteno ani yama alisaya tokiyatamienena agola tamamine.
Nagai naguafima muse yama hanea yana tamakai tamakupi male hava-telama-tesua yafe mani kea tamaha-pai-mainoane.
Nagaya Polonae Timotigahe mani avona negaove. Anumaya Kotia tagu tamema aligati-mainea kanoene Yisasi Kalaisifema tametiti nehuna kanoene naumono maleteana nahapaiagena Aposolo kanoa mainoe.

Anemoya maa huya maisaya yafe nenahaiye amakaiami amaugafa aliya ohaiya kenaage fai-lineya ako huya maineya vayamoya auluma hamaesaya yafena amaugafale konagali ya ali-malesaya yafena ohuya Anumayamo kema akave nemalaya veamogami auava kava huya maineya mai kayone huya maisae.
Momaketeno nofiteti alifagagi maleneno mukia vayama sipi sipima pulumaka afuyakaene mono nopiti ali helafi neataleno monema ayeyahaema nehaya vayamogami folomoamiene moneamiene ali helafi-talene.
Kanale kava haenagaa hisunafene huno Anumaya Kotia tagaila Yisasi Kalaisiene alino ailokaelateneno haegafa veane alino hapae-latene.

Nenahaiya nafunagana-gatama Anumaya Kotia tamakaifena Tamakua namitafa hu-mainafi namitafa ohunafi? huno tamake-mainea augafa yana atamoma tamaugafama tesagalia augafa kava huno vayi hu-lamatesia yafena tamakesa kumoa ohino.

Sipi sipi nafanemoa ama alisia kanamoa ago falote higeno alisia amoa ago talo tala huno maineafe tagaya tusia muse nehuta taipa kanale yapiti yagamea huta Anumaya Kotina tokiyaage hale yamaa hanea agia alisaga hisune.

Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamema ago aligati-mainea yana kapale talo humale tumano ku kana hinagetama alitama tamakenopale vai-linetama Alu Aotage Avamumona ayaaya naepe kana huno avenene humainegi animona Anumaya Kotina kea hanegi alitama tokiyaage hiho.
Haviteno mogeana nago Isipi kote kanomoa Isaleli kanomona aiko-neligeno Mosesea moli-neataleno anonaa ani Isipi kote kanoa haegeno fali-maine.
Tagaya mukia tafu-tagana-gatama mage huta tamahanepaune kanale auava yamofena tamakaveno hutetama kasalo otamahaeno.
Kayetama mainetama Yisasife havitama lamakupi malenaya yana atafa hutama kolia ohutama lokiya vaitama maiho.

Tamaa omalenea Anumayamona agia Molekifena tusia muse hutama agai agi alisaga hisaya nona kitetama alitama utama tamaa omalenea Anumayamona agia Lefanifena tusia muse hutama kanefi kana yana talo hutama ani augafa yayagale musena hutama tamakula amitafa hutama amakia alisaga nehae. Naama haya yafe kame vayamoya humatesugetama kotamilegatila tamavaleya Papiloni kola agasetama ame kaiyaga umaigahae.” huno humaineane.
Ke humainea yafe nafunagana-gatama hetitama fatago hutama maiho. Mukia Anumaya Koti kema tavayafiti huge amave-lige nehuna yaene avopi kae-malenona kene atafa hutama akave maletafa hutama maleho.
Anumaya Kotia tagaya agola maige maige hisunafene huno talo hu lateneanagita ani yafena “Tamage nehie.” huta havisuna yafe Alu Aotage Avamula lamine.
Anemoya amakaiami amaugafa aliya ohaiya Anumayamo keagema havisaya yafe ako huya maineya kanaleya huya havisae.
Nagoke kanomoa Anumayamo aliya nealisia kanomofe Naa huno havi kava nehie. hunoma hisigetamahena kea ohaviho. Tolemoganifi tagufa vayamoyama tamahapaisagetamahena havitetama kaiyekea hutesae.

Anumaya Koti anagamogatama nehuna kava hutama tamahaote tamahaote mukia tafu-taganagamina tamayana amamitama ali falu fala humateho. Mukia kumate maineya Yisasi anagamoya “Mainafio?” huya hu falu fala hulamatae.

Nehuya tanefa kateya amanupi aiteya avia neateya hamauna nehuya mage huya hugahae ‘Vaeha ala kumamogae tusia lahau nehane.’ Mukia tipi kaleyagamona amafaheya anile visayaamoya miyaamima ani kumategatila ala huya nealiyanagi nagoke yagefi haviya-tafana hane.’ huya hugahae.

Vaeha Nelafaa tagaifema tusiya huno hau ayamopafima nehaiyanagino tagaifena Anumaya Kotia nafaneyagania mainae. huno humaine. Tamage agaia nafaneyagalafa mainone. Ma mopale yafema muse nehaya veamoya Anumaya Kotifema havilama huya ohaviya kava huya tagayama Anumaya Koti nafanema mainona yafena tagaienefena havilama nohae.

Neyavemo-gatama ala vayamogami amaiyaafinaga maiho. Mukia veamogatama tamaugafa alitama ohaitama tamafu-tamakana-gamienena mailava hutama maiho. Anumaya Koti avopfina mage huya kae-malenayane Anumaya Kotia amaugafama aliya nehaiya veamogamina kame lagino kae neamategi mailava huya yuna heya mainesaya veamo-gamina hau humateno kayone hisaya yana neamamie. huya kae-malenayane.

Aao ania ohugahie. Mukia veamoya havigeage veane mainesayana Anumaya Kotia tamageage kano maine. Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenayane “Anumaya Kotiga humalenana kemoa ‘Fatago kano mainane.’ huno hugatene. Kaiyekema hugateleasina amakasateasine.” huya kae-malenayane.
Ala mono note ala kava vayamoya avona amigeno malema kagai kagilema nunamu huta kahavinegona veanea kina hulategahe emaine.” huno hie.

Anumaya Koti amaune vayala mainagi havigeage amaune vayamoya veamogami amunopi vayi hu-maineya havigea hu-maveli ha-maveli hu-mainayanagiya ania huya tamakai amunopitila hetiya maigahae. Maineya kesi kava huya veala ali haviya hamaisaya havigeamia nehuya amaku amamema miya huno aligati-mainea Anumayamofena amakaveno huteteya amakaiami amaku amamena ali haviya hugahae.

Mani kehena Yisasia “Anumaya Kotia nagai Nenafae.” huno nehuno “Nagaya Anumaya Kotiene nago kana kana hutaa mainoe.” hunoma nehia kene Sapati kanale kahegi kema atagae-mainea yafeene Yuta vayamoya nagoene ke vaiteya “Haegahune.” huya hu-mainae.
Kahegi malena tamahapaugetama tamakela okanitama kanale kava hutama akave nemalayafe “Kanale kava nehae.” huna musena hu nelamatoe.
Nayona Tevitia Yisasima falimainesifitima alino heti-tesia yafena mage huno humaineane “Mukia kanafina Anumayaniamoa nagaiene maineno tamaga nayategama mainea yafena kolia ohugahue.

Anumaya Kotia lamategetama tamakaya ago haegafa nafane falote humainae. Anumaya Kotia vayamoya avina huya nafane alivina nehaya ya kana yateti otamatene. Tamakaya haviya hu-lavino hano hisia avina yatetila falote ohunagi Anumaya Koti keletilagino haegafa yamaa hanea kegino ani kemoa hanege hanege huno tamakaila tamatene.

Ani yafe tamakaya nagoke nagokemo-gatama kefo yama humainesaya yafena nagoamo-gami amaule hu falote hisageya Anumaya Kotitega ke huya havigesageno falu lamahaisia yana lamamigahie. Fatagoma huya nemaisaya veamoya huya havigesaya nunamumoa tokiyaa haneanagino mukia veala amaya hugahie.
Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagaifema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainaya veamoya agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago ali-mainae.
Na yafe tama-talesugetama megusa nafane kana hutama omaigahayanagina tamakaitela etena egahue.
Tamage Yuta veamoya kanale yana kasagoya alimainae. Hagoteno Anumaya Kotia humainea kema kae-malenaya kea amayapi malene.

Tamaugafa miya hu-malenage-tama nofipi mainetama miya oali aliya veamogatama mopale mainaya kava vayatamimogami amaiyaafinaga mainetama koliami hutama keamia havitama akave maleho. Anumayamo aliya nealiya avamete hutama tole lamaku tamakesa ohavitama tamakuamoa fatago hinagetama aliyatela maiho.

Ifi Anumaya Kotia tusiya huno kayone yamaa tamamiteno aupaa kaiyekea hu notamategi ayaayate tamakava maime neuno kefo yama haya yafena anonaa aupaa alitagifeno notamamigetama “Ani kefo yana afa ya kana yane.” hutama tamakesa nehaviyo? Havige nehagi kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hutama “Nagoene ohugahune.” hutama hisayafene huno Anumaya Kotia kayone hulamateno kaiyekema huotamatea yafena nohaviyo?

Naama haya veafena Anumayatimona Yisasi Kalaisi agile hulokiya vaita kea mage huta hamanepaune Tamakaya kanaleya hutama mainetama aliyama alisaya aliyateti kavela ali falote hutama neho. huta nehune.

Ani Yosefena nepuamoya Yosefefe tusia amaipa kafa heteteya avaleya alu vayamogami neamamiya mone aligeya Isipi kotega avaleya vayanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiene maineno kanama haiya yana alitaleno kanale agu agesa amigeno Isipi sauve kanoa, Felona, aulagale hetigeno Feloa muse huno “Hagote kava kano maineka nagai noyagaene mukia Isipi kotega kava yagaigane.” huno hutene.

Haigeno amakai amunopitila nago kanomo agia Agapusie heti-mainegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa hapaigeno aune laga huno mage huno humaine “Tusia kafu hisaya kana mukia mopale evayi hugahie.” huno humainea kemoa ani kafuma efalotema hia kanafina Kolotiusia sauve kano maine.
Mani kea huteno soka vayaene Poloa aleya ayeno Anumayamotega ke huno havige-maine.
Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainona veanea Yisasia yafaga yosale fali-mainea kava huta atafa laku takesaene age lahaye hisuna yaene ago fali lavata humainone.
Nafunagana-gatamae nagoa kana yama tamakaitema falote hisigetamahena ma lamakesa haviho Inamona musekase hisuna yane. hutama hiho.
Omaleanagita tagaya Anumaya Kotiene taguamoa nagoke taipale mainone. nehuta haniki mai yapima ute etema hisunana havige nehuta kelamage kemona akave nomalone.
Ageana ikamoa aihagalo higeno nagola tusia kena kana yana aluga aluga atupale nofi aye-maleteya atalageno mopafi enelavigeno age-maine.

Tagaya ma kumayagaleti emainone Patiaene Mitiaene Elamiene Mesopotemiaene Yutiaene Kapatosiene Potusiene Esiaene Filigiaene Pamafiliaene Isipiene Sailinia aupaale Lipia kotegatiene Lomuene Kalitiene Alepiaene naa kotegati emainonagi Yuta vayaene Yuta vayamogami Anumaya Kotiamimo ke havilinaya vayaene emainonagi tahaote tahaote ketifiti Anumaya Koti tokiyaleti humainea kavafe tahapai-mainae.” huya hae.

Hiya hisigetama tamakaya kama vaiyesayana Anumayamo veane fatago hutama maisageno Anumayamoa mukia maisaya auava yatamihena ‘Nagai nafanemoya amatea kava nehae.’ huno haisie. Mukiama nehaya kavala kanale yakeya falote hisigetama Anumaya Koti aepaa aluya hutama agetetama agaifema havilinaya yatamimoa ala hisie.

Timotigae, nagai nafanemoga, nayona nagoamogamina Anumayamoa avayafiti kea kagaifena huno falotema humainea augafa ke menia ma avopima kaenama kamua kahegi kemoa hanegi ani kemona fatago huka akave malesanana ani keleti Satanienena tua hugane.

Nagaya anile havugeno kasagoya ikapinaga mainaya veamoya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Tagaya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune. Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema humategahena kanaleya huno kelamage keleti fatago huno kaiyekea hu neamateno ani kumai amona tokiyaama hanegeno mukia ma mopafi veafena ‘Kefo yama hiho.’ huno ali haviya hu neamatea yatetila Anumaya Kotia ani kefo yamo anonaa ago amine. Ani kumai amoa Anumaya Koti aliya veala hamaeno falimateneanagino ani yateti Anumaya Kotia kefo yamaamo anonaa ago amine. Amineanagita Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune. Anumaya Kotitimoa agaiage tokiyaage hale yamo aepa maineanagino tagu tamena ago aligati-maineanagita agia alisaga nehune.”
Nayona kefo kava huge huge hutama mainaya yamoa tamahaegetama fali-mainageno Kalaisia ago fali-mainafiti ali hetilamatene.

Havigu tamakaya “Kalaisia tagai kefo yafe huno fali-maine.” hutama Anumayamo kapufiti nenetama Kefo Avamumogami neamamiya tina mo neyafenagi ani kavala tamage hutama ohiho. Havigu tamakaya Anumayamo kave nenetama Kefo Avamumogami amamiya kaveene neyafenagi ani kavala ohiho.

Vai neayetama munane ane amaugafale maiya vai neayaya kavaene moli huliteya nehaya kavaene mukia ani oniyaage kefo yaene alu kanomofe age lamahaye hisaya yaene ohiho. Tamakaya Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga mainagi havigu Na kava nehae. huya hulamateyafenagi ani kavala mukia yupa ohiho.

Amaku amakesamoa oniya ohunea veamogami amaulagafina mukia yamoa oniyaagela ohunegi Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nohaya veamogami amakupina oniyaage hu-maineanagino mukia yana oniyaage hu-mainegeno amaku amakesamoa Ma kavala kanale yanagi atu yana havi yane. huya ohavinae.

Mani kema haviya veamoya tusia amamayo neaiya mage huya hae “Mani kanomoa Yelusalemu maineno Yisasi agilema nehaviya veala ago hamaeteno ma kumate eno aniama nehaya veane kina humateno ala mono note kava vayate kaiyeke humatesia yafe amavalegahe emainea kanofi?” huya hae.

Higeno Kalaisia aliyamoa mopafi maineya mono aliya vayamogami aliyana amakase-maine. Yisasia Anumaya Kotiene mopafi veanene amunotifi maineanagino Anumaya Kotiene alino hagelafi-latene. Ani haegafa kemoa nayoma alino hagelafi-matenea kemona agase-maine. Menia Anumaya Kotia Tusia kanale yama hulamategahue. huno huteno haegafama hulokiya vai-maleneanagino nayona Ma yama hulamategahue. huno humainea kemona ago agase-maine.
Haegafama hunama mainoana Kalaisia nagaila aepania maineanagina falisuana tusia kanale yania aligahue.
Nagaya ago havimainoe Anumaya Kotia tamakupima kanale aliyama aepa hemainea aliyana alime alime haino Yisasi Kalaisi eteno esia yupa hano hugahie.

Yisasi Kalaisia, Anumaya Koti nafanemoa, eaamo aepaa agelama hisuna tagu tagesa ago tamineafe tamage Anumaya Kotina agelama nehuta agaiene nafaneamoene ailokaeta mainone. Ani kanoa tamage Anumaya Koti maineno agola maige maige hisuna tahaimumona aepaa maine.
Tamakaitamia tuma hisaya yafena tamakesa ohavitafa hutama mukia veanenena yuna hetama maiho.

Anumaya Kotia Maa yama hu-lamategahue. huno hu lokiya vai-malenea kemoa ani yana tamage huno hugahie. Tamage huno hu-maineafe tametitia nehune. huta hu falote nehuna kehena tole lagesa ohavisunagi tokiya vaita atafa hu-lisune.

Tama-talena ugahe tamaipa falu hutama maisaya tamaku tamakesa nelamamue. Nagayama naipa falu huna nemauva nagu nagesa nelamamue. Anima tamaipa falu hutama maisaya yama tamamua yana ma mopale veamoya amaipa falu nehaya ya kana ohunegi kanaage tamaku tamakesa havitama kolia ohiho.
Tamineafe taguamoa kolia nohianagita havilama huta havilinone ma mopafi mainona kanafina ikapinaga Anumayamo avatela omainonane.

Nagoa veamogatama nagai kema havitetama nakavema omalesayana nagaya tamakaila kaiyekea hu otama-tegahue. Ma mopale veamogamina kaiyekea hu-ma-tegahue huna omenogi ma mopale veamogamina amaugafa ali-gatigahue huna emainoe.

Tagaya Kenima humainea kava ohisune. Kenia Satani nafanema mainea yafe aganaamona haegeno fali-maine. Naa higeno haegeno fali-maine? Aganaamoa fatago huno mainea yafe agaia kefo kavaage nehia kanogino aipa haviya huteteno aganaamona haegeno fali-maine.
Ala imikefa aligeno mukia hagelimo amunopima hanea mopaene agoyagaene fanane humainae.

Ategeno Apalahamua kosuna leteno ago faligahe hianagi agaipiti aginagomoya ohavunamaa veane ateya aitagu-fageno ikatema hanea kanefiyagamo hia avamete huteya ti kahaepamoma hia avamete huya ohavunamaa veane aitagufe-mainae.

Anumayamoa mukia kanafina agola maige maige nehia Sauve Kanomoa ofaligahianagita tagaya agaila oagegahune. Anumaya agaiage mainea yafe veamogata agai agia alisaga huge huge nehisunageno mukia kanafina hale-mainea tokiya yamaa hanege hanege hisie huta hisune. Mani kea tamage.

Vai-yeno ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotia veamogami alino kaiyekema humatesia kanamoa ago falote hu-mainegi tamakaya koli nehutama Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hiho. Anumaya Kotia ikaene mopaene hageliene mopafitima kapai nehagea tiene agaia talo hu-malegetama agai agia alisaga hiho.” huno humaine.

Kasagoya veamoya Yisasi kea haviya amakupi maleneya amaku aminaya kanafina nagoa ani veamoya Kaliki ke havilinaya vea mainagi nagoa veamoya Hipalu ke havilinae. Kaliki kema havilinaya veamoya mage hae “Tagai megusa aneyaga havi kava hutama osi kanoa kavela neamamiyanagi Hipalu amakema neaiya megusa aneyaga kasagoya kave neamamiye.” huya amaipa haviya huya ke vai-mainae.
Ani kavama hisaya yafe Anumaya Kotia ago ke huno hu-lamatene. Tamakaya agai aiyakama maetama visaya yafe Kalaisia tamakaife huno agata yana ali-maine.
Nayona tamakaienema maineta mage huta tamahapai-mainone Nago kanomoa aliyama oalisia kanoa kavela onegahie. huta humainone.

Anumaya Kotia aiya nagoke nafanea maineanagi ma mopafi veanehe tusiya huno hau ayamopafi haigeno ani aiya nagoke nafanea hu-tegeno elavino emaine. Emainegeta tagaya nagoke nagokemogata agaife tagupi maleta tametiti hisunana haniki-mai yapi tegelege nehia atafina ougahunanagita agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula aliteta maigahune.
Nago yupa ani kava nehageno Kefo Avamumoa mage huno kenonaamia humaine “Yisasina ago agetena Polona age-mainogi tamakaya tagatamae?” huno humaine.
Higena nagaya agoana ani kefo afai afuene ma mopafi Sauve vayaene ati vayaamienena efe hosimo agupifima maiya kanoene ati vayaaene tu hugahe melitalu humainae.

Nagaya Lukunae Alisatakusiene Poloene umainone. Alisatakusia Masetoniati kanoe. Osi kumaamo agia Tesalonaika kanogino tagaiene vigeta nago Atalamitiumu kumate tipi kalefi haisaga humaunageno tipi kalemoa Esia komo haopalega haigahe higeta hai-mainone.

Kina nopima mainaya veala tamakaiene ani veanene nemaiya avamete hutama amaya hiho. Ali haviya humataya veafena ania huya tagaila ali haviya hulatageno amaugafa amakata aiya avamete huno tagata neaye hutama amaya hiho.
Mukiama hisaya kavaene kenema mukia ani yateti Anumayatimona Yisasi agia alisaga nehutama agaiama hulatenea yafena Anumaya Kotitega musena hiho.
Yisasi mono kema tamahapaisia kanomona kanale yama tamamefe malenesaya yapiti aye fako hutama amiho.

Emaineanagi Anumaya Kotia agaia atafa hisia mopa nago atupa kanoa ani mopa nagoke aiya malesia mopa oaminegi “Haenagaa kamigahue. Ani mopa atafa hulinesanageya kagaipiti falote hisaya nafaneyagamoya aligahae.” huno hianagi ani kanafina Apalahamua namo kano maineane.
Falote huno maineno tagai nofi vayala ayemavataga huno huhaviya huneamateno “Nafaneya-gatamia hamaesunageya faligahae.” huno tokiyaage ke humaineane.
Hana-paigeana haviteana Pitaene Yisasima nehaiya kanoene Yisasi komulega umainae.
Ani yafe Anumaya Koti aulagaleene veamogami amaulagaleene hilato ohunea kavala ohuna fatago huna maisua yafe kava yagaina nemauvane.

Nehageno kefo yama nehaya yamoa timoma tusiya huno hogiteno ti valufama alino ti agegayalega mo talia kava huno kefo yaamimoa ania augafa kava hu-mainegeta neamakone. Kanefimoma ikatela alu katete katetema ute ete nehia avamete huya havige huya mainagi kanaleya huno fatago humainea kana tamave-notiye. Tamave-notigeno Anumaya Kotia kumayu haniki-mainea kumala afepinaga hanea kumate maisaya yafe kumaamia ago talo tala humateneanagiya agola anifinaga maigahae.
Nagaya nagoa vayapitila mani mono kea oalinoe. Nagoa vayamoya hu naveligena mani mono kea oalinogi Yisasi Kalaisia agaia mani mono kea hu naveligena havitena tamahanepauve.

Hagoteta tagaya atafa lagu tagesaene mainonageno kahegi kemoa “Naa kavala ohiho.” huno higeta ageta lahaye hisuna kefo tagu tagesa alino helafigeno mukia taugafamoa ania huno kefo yama hiafe fali yamaagela ali falote humaine.

Taveliteno Yuta vea omainaya veamoya mani kea havisae huno Anumayamoa hamapaisua yafe huno nagaila yogi-malenea ne mainoe. Aposolo kano mainena manima kelamage kema hamapaisugeya haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisaya yafe mani kea hu falote nehue. Mani kea havigea nohugi tamageage ke nehue.

Mukia Anumaya Kotia kahegi malenea kema akave nemalaya veamoya Anumaya Kotiene ailokaeya maigeno Anumaya Kotia ani veamoyaene ailokaeno maine. Ani yafema havisuna yafe Alu Aotage Avamula ago tamigeno tagai tagupi maine.
Tagaiti laugafa hamaesia yafekela tagesa ohavisune. Aao, alu veamogami yafe tagesa havita amaya hisune.
Tamafu-tamakanagamienena nagoke tamaku tamakesale maiho. “Ala vaya mainone.” hutama ohutama afa veanene vaiyatete hiho. “Nagainige kanale nagu nagesa hane.” hutama ohiho.
Huoatesayafe tamakaya tamaipa haviya hisia yaene ala kefiti ke nevaiya yaene tamahai vai yaene kamuge vaimate yaene mukia veane havitama haviya humatesaya yaene tamakaipitila ataleho.
Anumaya Kotia “Yisasina amakua aminaya veanea amaya huo.” huno hunateneanagina mukia Anumaya Koti kea huhalena tamahapaisugetama havilama hisayafene huno hunatene.
Agogeno ayolagefamoa efeage huno sipi sipimo ayolagefaleti talo humale nofi kana huteno efeage sia kana nehigeno aulagamoa ata nefemoma hia avamete humaine.

Tamakai tamaya hisunafe tagaitela kana yana falote nehianagi kasagoya veanele Anumayamo kayone yamaamoa falote higeya neagageno Anumayamoa kasagoya veala amaya nehianagia kasagoya veamoya Anumaya Kotifena muse huya agia alisaga hugahae.
Nagoa veamoya naugafaene kolaniaenema nesayana nagai nagupi mainagena nagaya ania huna amakai amakupina mainoe.

Havigegeno ani munamoa mage hie “E, Alanimoga nagaya nehavina ago nagupi malena nametiti hu-mainoe. Tamage nehae kagaya Kalaisigae Anumaya Kotia hu-ga-tegeka taugafa ali-gatigahe ma mopafi elavisana kano emainane. Anumaya Koti nafane mainane.” huno hie.
Lina falematageya amakaya mukia yupa nago amaku amakesa haviya Aposolo vayamogami kea haviya hameya maya kofa huya nete nete nehuya Anumayamotega muse huya nunamuna nehae.
Kagaya fatago auavafekeya negahaigeno kefo auavafena nokahaiyafe nagaya kagaikaa Anumaya Kotinia Negafugamina ago amakaseka ala kano mainane. huna masaveteti falegatogeka muse hugane.
Humateteno Yemesia Yonina nepuamona ayaaya naepeleti ageya fakaligeno fali-maine.
Nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotina nohaiya kea, afa keyagama, mohu mehu hisagekahena ani kavama hisalega ovuo. Ani kema nehaya veamoya Anumaya Koti kea amakaveno hutesaya kate amavaleya nevae.

Nagoa veamoya neamafugamima amaipa kafa hematesayana amakeyama fakaliya augafa veane mainagetama tamakaya ago age-mainae. Veama amakeya fakaliya veamogami amakupina agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula omalene.

Kavela netageno Yisasia Saimoni Pitana mage huno havige “Saimonigae Yoni nafanemoga kagaya ma vayala amakaseka nagoene kagua nenamino?” huno havige. Havigegeno Pitaa mage huno hie “E, Alaniamogae kagaya ago nehavine kagaifena nenahaiye.” huno higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya nagai sipi sipi nafaneyaga kavela amamio.” huno hapai-maine.
Alu Aotage Avamumoa nagoa veamogamina Anumaya Kotina agu agesaene kea hamapaisia tokiya amamiteno nagoa veamogamina falaki-mainea kemo aepaa havisaya amaku amakesa amamine.
Haenagaa eteya anile vageno Yosefea “Nagayae tamakanatamimona mainoe.” huno higeno Feloa Yosefe afamofena havimaine.

Aligahagi Anumaya Koti avopi mage huya kae-malenayane Nago kanomoma maiyamaahe Kanaleya huna mainena kanale kana vayima hisiana agegahue. huno hisia kanomoa avayaletila kamugea ovaino avefunamoa havigea ohisie. Havi auava yana akaveno huteno kanale auava kavaage hisie. Nagoamogamifena nagoke amaipa hisageno amaipamoa falu hisia yafe aluya huno tokiyaage aliya alino.
Mukia Yisasi kema haviya amakuama aminaya veamoya nagoke amaku amakesale maineya nago kanomoa agaiage yafena ageteno “Nagainige yane.” huno ohunegi “Mukia yana tagaiti yamaage hane.” huya humainae.
Anumayamoa nahapaigena havimainoa kemoa uhagoteno agase-mainea kea mage huna tamahapai-mainoe Anumayamo avopi kae-malenea kate Kalaisia kefo yama humainona yatefene huno fali-maine.

Anumaya Kotia ageana ani kumate mainaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina amakua aminaya veanene agai amaune veanenena ma mopafina kasagoya veanenena hamaeya falimatenaya kolamoa ani kumapina hanea yafe auhanageke yamaamoene hanea yateti Anumaya Kotia ali haviya hutegahie.

Nehaageya Isaleli vea omainaya veamoya mani kea haviteya tusia muse huya Anumayamo kea alisaga humainae. Naa nehuya Anumaya Kotina haigenoma “Agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula aligahae.” huno hapali-malenea veamoya mani kea haviteya aliya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.
Yisasia mani kema tahapaiya kanomoa mage hie “Tamage nagaya aupaa egahue.” huno humaine. Higena nagaya Yonina mage huna nehue “E, tamage Anumayati Yisasiga eno.” huna nehue.

Nagaya mukia kavala huge tamave-ligema hugetama ali-mainaya auavafeene mukia tamahapaugetama havimainaya auavafeene, higetama age-mainaya auavafeenena mukia kanafina ani kavakeya hiho. Naama hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia taipa falu hisia yama taminea kanomoa tamakaiene ailokaeno maigahie.
Tamakaya aniama hisia kanomofena Kefo kavaage hana kano mainane. hutama hu oatetama Taganatimoga mainane. hutama agu agesa amigeno agua aiyahae huno eteno kanale kate esie hutama hiho.

Havigu nagoa veamoya afa kema, yasimo alino esia kema, nehuya havige ayelamavataga nehuya tamavayu huya havi kapi tamatesagi tamakaya kaye ho. Naa augafa veamoya taginagomogami kavaene ma mopafi havigu kene aliya nehagi Yisasi Kalaisifena nohae.
Anumaya Kotia Yisasi Kalaisi keleti Anale haiyo. huno humaineafe tusiya huna naiyayena Ani legana yate uka mo talo. huno humainele uvayi hutena muse yania alisue huna nehue.

Kefo kavama maita nehuna yamo nofila hulatenegeno tagu tamema aligatisiafene huno Yisasia agaia augafa hakino fali-maine. Ani kefo yapiti alino kalu helateno lavayu hisia miya ataleno fali-maine. Lavayu huteno mukia kefo yatia ago aye hami-lategeno taguamoa efeage higeta agaia veane mainonafe tagaya taya mukiki huta kanale aliya alisunafene huno fali-maine.

Magi nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-pauve nagoa veamoya kenia haviya hu-natenea kanomofe ‘Tamage nehie.’ huya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana ani veamogamina agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago ali-mainae. Ani veala hagoteya fali-mai vaya kana huya mainafiti hetiya hamaimuamia ali-mainae. Haenagaa Anumaya Kotia kaiyekea hu oama-tegahie.
Nagaienema kea kea hia ensole kanomoa ani kumaene kegiyaene fiaene maleno agege gege huno hapaligahe kanileta yafateti talo humale kayona ali-line.

Ani veamoya amakaiami amaugafamo age haye hia yafena tusia muse nehuya Ani yamoa Anumaya Kotina agaseno kanale ya hane. huya amakaye hisifa kavafena musemaa hu neateya ma mopafi yafekeya amakesa havi havi huya nemaiye. Naama nehaya veamoya hani yapi tegelege nehia atafi ugahae.

Meni kanoa Anumaya Koti nafanema haegafa emainesia kanomoa kava yagaisia aliyatela he otino. Havigu hetinunoa agaia augafa alino haisigeno Anumaya Kotia Satanina kaiyekema huteteno haeno fananema humainea kava huno ani kanomona ania augafa kava hutegahie.

Nenahaiya nafunagana-gatama Anumaya Kotia tamakaiene tagaiene tagu tamema ali negatia yafena mani avona kaena tamamisue huanagi nago yamoa falote higeno Anumaya Kotia alu nagesa namigena mage nehue. Yisasima hu-latenea yafena mukia kea ago tahapaigeta havimainona kanale mono kehena nagoa veamoya Ohaviho. huya nehagena ani kema hisaya vayaene Ke nevaitama maiho. huna mani avona negaove.
Ani veamoyama humainaya kefo yaamimoa ala itugefamoma hia kava huno maleme maleme ikapi nehaiyanagino Anumaya Kotia mukia ani kumate veamoyama hu-mainaya kefo yafena agesa havino maine.

Musena hutetageno Yisasia eteno Kalili hanea kumala Kena kumate uvayi hu-maine. Ani kumatela Yisasia tifena higeno nofi alagamo ti hapae-mainea kumale. Yisasia anile umainegeno nago kamani kava kanoa, Kapaneamu kumate kanogino, neamoa kali ali-maine.
Mukia kanafina aliyageya nealisagetama kasalo kasala kea ohiho. Tamakupina Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaaleti tamakaila ali hetinagetama Anumayamo aliyana aliho.

Tamakaya Yisasina oagenagi tamakua maitama neamiye. Meni kanafina agaila oagenagi aluya hutama agaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hu-mainaya yafena muse yatamimoa ala hinagetama mage hutama nehae Muse huna kavala alumoni naguafi hanegi hanaa huna tamahapaisue? hutama nehae.
Anumaya Kotia Alu Aotage Avamua ago taminea yafe Anumaya Kotia tagupi maigeta tagaya agai agupi mainone. huta havimainone.
Higeya nofi alagafiti falote hia tina nagola havate-mai keayola aliya havagoyafa kana yana ani lipi ayeteya kayote vaiya ali-saga huya Yisasina avayale malenae.
Hagoteno Satani kava hulategeta hani yapi mainonageno Anumaya Kotia ani yapiti tavaleno agaia hau ayamopafi nehaiya nafanemo kava yagai-mainelega tavaleno latene.

Mukia nafunaganagatama tamakesa alisua kea haviho. Nagoa vayamoya emaineya tamahapai-mainoa kemona amakaveno huteya neatagaeya tamakaya mono kema havigahe alitaluma nehaya yapi melifako hisaya kema nehaya vayamogamifena kayetama mainetama ani kema nehaya vayamogamina tamakaveno humateho.

Nagoa veamogamima muse yama amafu-amakanagami amaya hisaya tokiyama amaminesia aliyana aliya tokiya vaisae. Nagoa veamogamina veane humaveli hamaveli hisaya tokiyama amaminesiana ali lokiya vaiya humaveliho.

Ani kanama evayima hisiana tamakaya nagaila nago yafena nahavi-okegahae. Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-pauve nagaifema hutama nagai nagima ayetama nago yafema Nenafama havigesayana mukia havigesaya yana afaa tamamigahie.

Ani ala kumatema amalagu aimale yatema hu-maleana kegiyale malenaya yafana ala miyakefa hai-mainea yafateti malete malete huno humalene. Hagotenoma malegamae-malenea yafamo agia yasipa. Kanale auava yama hisaya yafema havilinesaya veamoya ani kanale yama ohisayana kefo ya nehae.

Nehageno ala sauve kanomo sialeti nago kemoa falote huno mage hie “Tamakaya Anumaya Koti aliya nealitama aiyafinagama mainaya veamogatamaene afa veanene tamakima hanea veanenena Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hiho.” huno humaine.
Havimainonanagi menia ma mopafi taugafale mainonafe “Kasalo tahae.” huta ikapinaga maisuna taugafa tamisia yafe tusiya huno nelahaiye.
Alu veala neamaketama Amakaila ago amakase-mainone. hutama ohutama mukiamogatama aliyatamia fako hutama Kanale yapi havi yapi? hutama agetetama kanale yama hanesigetamahena ani yafekeya muse hiho.

Nago kanomoa hage-malenesia aamofena hagoteno “Afaa tokaetaa omaigahue.” huno huteno haenagaa tusi haye hisigeno “Kanale kavala hu noatoe.” huno haisia kava huno ani munala alitesie. Alitesiana kefo yana ohugahie.

Amakaya tamakaila mono nopitila tamavaleya tamanati-talegahae. Ani kanama esia kanafina nagoa veamoya tamakaila nelamahaeya ma amakesa havigahae ‘Mani kavama nehunana Anumaya Kotina akave nemalone.’ huya hugahae.

Nagaya Yonina nagola tusia tokiyaage alegana avame yana ikapinaga falote higena agoana maa humaine. Sevenia (7) ensole vayamoya anile maineya sevenia (7) havi yatafana veamogami haenagalafa falote hisia ali haviya humatesia yana atafa hulinae. Anima ali haviya humatesia yana hano hisigeno Anumaya Kotina aipamoma ata nelea yana agola hano hugahie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Kefo kema hu-mainesugekahena nagaya kefo kema hua kea hu-falote huka naha-paiyo. Nagayama kanale kema hu-mainesugekahena naa higeka nai-ko-neline?” huno hie.

Nehuafe kagaya Anumaya Koti aliyama ailokaetaa nealua kanomoga ani atalana anaya huo. Ani atalamogania nagaiene Kalemeniene nagoa nagaienema aliya nealiya veanene ailokaeta Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kema hamanepauna aliyana ali-mainae. Ani veamogami amakima agola maige maige hisaya hamaimuene veamogami amaki kae-malenea avopi amakia hanegi ani atalana anaya huo.

Ani veamoya kagaikaa alu aotage veanene amaune veanekaene hamayageya fali-mainae. Faligeno ani veamogami kolamoma takilavi-mainea yafe kagaya ani kefo yaamimo anonaamia neamaminanagiya ani kola tima nesayana kagaya kanale kava hu nematane.” huno humaine.
Na kea ohutafa huta ohisune. Kefo kava nehuna yana ago ataleta falimainea augafa veane mainone. Falimainaya veamoya kefo yana ohugahae.

Maigahianagi kefo afai afumoa nayona maineanagino menia ago fali-mainea afugino eiti (8) molia Sauve kano maineanagino seveni (7) molia Sauve anagapi maineanagino hani yapi visiaamo tege-lege nehia atafi agola umaigahie.

Anumaya Koti avopina mani nafanehena mage huno humaineane Afaa mainea agihena amo nafanemofena nefaa Kanale hulamategahue. huno humainea yana aligahianagi nofipi maineno miya oali aliya amo nafanemoa tokaeana mani yana oaligahie. Ani yafe aliya amoene nafaneaene hunategeana vio. huno humaineane.

Kanaleya huta maigahunanagi Mone afenoti alita kasago hisunema. haya veala ani yamoa Kefo kava hiho. huno aye-mavataga hisigeya hanagimalenea kalifufi hemaleneya amaugafa ali haviya hisia yafe aneginagi yapi asaga hulaviya kefo kavaage hisaya yaamimo ayegeamategeya ali haviya humatesigeno amaugafa amakata aigahie.

Anima tenia (10) aveyagama hanegeka agana tenia (10) Sauve vayamoyaene ani kefo afai afuene ali nagopi ataleya ani kumai amona amaipa kafa huteteya ali haviya hutegahae. Huteya aluya huya tua huteteya kenaa augafaletila hate-taleteya augafa alagaage mainesigeya augafamona amea neteya atafi kae-talegahae.
Ohavinegi nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotina amakua aminesaya veala Anumaya Kotia amakaila ago amakelama humaine.
Naane hisune? Tagaya Yuta veamogata nagoa veala ago amakase-mainono? Aao, tamage huna tamahapauve tagaya mukia veala Yuta veanene Yuta vea omainaya veanene kefo kava nehuna yamo alino aikagilatene.
Mani kea huteya nagola pulamakamo nafanea amayateti talo humaleteya “Anumaya Kotitia ma maine.” huya anima amayatetima talo humalaya yafena tusia muse huya afua heya kaeteya aliya mominae.

Anima tusiya huno ali haviya hia yamoma ohamaenea veamoya agayanagi kefo yama humainaya yafena amakua aiyahae nohae. Kanileta yafatetiene siliva yafatetiene haesa yafatetiene afa yafatetiene yosaletiene talo hu-malenaya yafena “Anumayati mainae” huya hayanagi ani yayaga amaulaga oageya kea ohaviya kama vai oayeyama nehaya afa anumayamo-gamiene Kefo Avamumogami amakiene alisaga huya “Anumayati mainae.” huya nehaya kavala oatalenae.

Tagaya Anumayamofena “Kolia hisuna kano maine.” huta havilineta veamoya fatago huya maisaya auava yana amave-nelune. Anumaya Kotia lagupina nelageno “Kanale kava nehae.” huno nehio? Ifi tamakaya tamakuafinaga tagaifena “Kanale kava nehae.” hutama nehao? huna nehue.

Nayo kanafina tagaya ani veanene tokaeta maineta atafa lagu tagesamo taugafa age lahaye hisuna kavafekeya akave maleta mainonageya mukia veama kefo kava humainayafe anonaamia amakata aisia yana alisaya kava huta mani anonaa aligahe hunanagi Anumaya Kotia laya humaine.

Pitaa mani kea nehuno alu ke alu ke huno kanaye kanaye huno mage huno hie “Meni kanafima mainaya veamoya tusia kefo kava maiya nehagi havigu tamakaya kefo kava huyafenagi atalegeno Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamena aligatino.” huno humaine.
Aao atafa lamaku tamakesalema vaiyesayana faligahagi Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaleti tamaugafa age haye hisia yama hae falisayana agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimuene maigahae.
Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno humaine “Nagoa veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana amakayea ohugahae.” huno humaineane.

Hagotena ma yafe tamahapaigahue. Mukia ma mopale veamoya tamakaifena “Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veane mainae.” huya lamakaifena hagena havimainoa yafena aluya huna lamakaifena Yisasi Kalaisi hulatenea yateti Anumaya Kotinimotega musena nehue.
Nafunagana-gatama, Anumaya Kotia hau ayamopafima nehaiya tafutagana-gatama, Anumaya Kotia tamakayama agai veama maisaya yafe ago huyogi-malegeta tagaya ago havimainone.

Uhagote kea mage huno nehie tamakaya tamafu-tamakana-gamina tamakuama amamisaya yana atafa hutama tokiyaage hiho. Kaguama aminesana kanomoma kefo kavama hisigeka aupaa aigeateka kefo yamaa ataletegane.

Polofe “Lomu kumate tipi kalefi ugane.” huya huteya avaleya nagoa nofipi mainaya vayaene amavaleya ati vayate kava kanomo ayapi amatenae. Ani ati kanomo agia Yuliusie. Ani kanoa Sisaa, Sauve kanomo, ati kanoa maineane.

Ani veamoya Mosesea Anumaya Koti aliya kanomo yagamene Sipi sipi nafanemo yagamene huya maa humainae “Ala Anumaya Kotigae tusia tokiyakaa haneanagika mukia humainana yamoa kanaleya huka talo hanageta tagaya neagonageno tamayoa neaiye. Mukia mopafi veamogamina ala sauve kanoami maineka kava neyagaika kagaikaa auava yakamoa tamagelafa huno fatago humaine.
Ataletetama yaufa nafanemoma nufema aluya huno nesia agesa nehia kava hutama Anumaya Kotina kanale kea nesaya tamakesa havitamama nesayana ko hisageno Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamena aligatigahie.

Nagaya Yonina ikapinagati nago kea havugeno mage huno hie “Kagaya kea maa huka kao mukia Anumayamoene ailokaeya nemaiya veamoya menima aepa heya falisaya veamoya tusia muse hugahae.” huno humaine. Higeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa mage hie “E, aliya ali-mainaya yana neataleya maifalu hisageya kanale kavama hu-mainaya yamoa amakaiene ugahae.” huno humaine.

Nehigi Anumaya Kotia Nelafa aufina nagola tusia kanale tametiti hisuna yana mage huno hane. Megusa anagala havi no nemaiyafe amaya nehuta kama vaiyesuna yatela kava yagaisune. Havigu ma mopafi kefo yama hisunana Anumayamo aufina taguamoa oniyaage hugahie.
Havigu nagoa veamoya tamaipa ayesaya ke huya havige ayelamavataga hisaya yafe mani kea nehue.

Hagena havugeno mukiama Anumaya Kotia talo humalenea yamoa ikapinaga mainaya yaene mopafima mainaya yaene mopamo agusafinagama mainaya yaene tipima mainaya yaenena mukiamoya mage huya hae “Sauve kanomo siale mainana Anumaya Kotigaene Sipi sipi nafanene agola mukia kanafina muse hisaa yamoa hanege hanege huno hanesie. Tokiyaage hale yamaaene tanakia haneanagita alisaga hisunageno anale hanesigetana kava hisaa tokiyatanimoa hanege hanege huno hanesie.” huya hae.

Asagali-talegeno tu (2) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena higeno ala agoya kana yana ata nelegeno hagelipi tavi-maine. Ani hagelimona tagufale (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga hanea timoa kolamaage huno vali vali humaine.
Motafa huya avayu huya kumategati malaga hagayu hutaleneya yafa kayoteti hagayu huya aiko-neliya “Fatago kava nehune” huya hisaya yafe siotaamia asagiya kava kanoa, Solo aiyafi mo-malenae.
Ania huno nago kemoa mage humaineane “Tamakaya Yuta vea omainaya anagala Anumaya Kotina agia alisaga nehigeya mukia veamoya ania huya agia alisaga hiho.” huno humaineane.

Aao Anumaya Kotia mukia yama talo humalenea kanogino aepaa maine. Mukia yana agaia haumainea yamaage haneanagita tagaya agola mukia kanaaene kanaaene Anumaya Kotina agaiage agi alisaga hisune. Tamage.

Faeteya kotigeya Yisasia Yonitega eneegeno Yonia ageteno mage huno nehie “Ageho mani kanoa Anumaya Kotina Sipi sipi nafaneae. Haenagaa haesageno falisia yateti ma mopale veamogamina kefo yaamia ali-talesia yafe emaine.

Nagi Yeliko kumate veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviya amakaveno hutenaya yafe Isaleli vayamoya amakasageya fali hano hayanagi nagola kumai yate vai neaya amo agia Lehapue ani yupa ofaline. Ani amoa Anumaya Koti kea havino agupi maleno ametiti hia yafe Isaleli vayamoya yaufa neeya tole kanolatana hunatageana amamata hugahe vaageno ani amoa anaya huno nomaafi anavaleno anategeana fayaa yafe Anumaya Kotia haoke hegeno ofaline.
Musufa kanomoa musufa yana nehuno veala nehamaeno ali haviya hu-ma-tegahe neeanagi nagaya kanalenale tamahaimu tamamigahe emainoe. Agola hano ohu tamahaimula tamamigahe emainoe.
Ugahayanagi tagaya ikapinaga anaga mainonanagino tagu tamema aligatisia kanomofena, Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia, ikapinagatila ataleno elavisia yafe tametitia huta agava mainone.
Veamoya Anumaya Koti agima alisaga hisayafe Kalaisia tamakaila ali falu fala hulamateno tamavale-mainea kava hutama tamafu-tamakanagamina ali falu fala humatetama amavaletama nagoke tamaipale maiho.

Mainayanagika mukia vayamoya kagaifema agoma havimainaya kehema ‘Havige nehae.’ huya hisayafena kagaife ‘Anumaya Koti kahegi kemo akave nemale.’ huya hu-gatesayafena ani foa (4) vayala amavaleka amakaienena Anumaya Koti aulagafina oniyaage yama omalesia kavala huka kagaikaa monea miya hisanageya amayolagefa laga humatesae.

Mainagi nagoa veamoya amaugafa laga humainayanagi ani kavakeyama ohayana Apalahamuma augafa laga ohunea kanafima humainea kava huya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi malenaya kavaene humainaya veamogami totoamimo maine.
Nunamuna huteya anakia aote yate kaeteya yopafi maleneya nagoke avayu huya agayana Matiasi agi avayu huteya ani kanoa avaleya hetitageno Aposolo vayapi maine.

Tevitia amakaifena mage huno Anumaya Koti avopina humaineane “Veamogatama kefo kavama haya kavala Anumaya Kotia ago aigetamateno atalelamateneafe muse hiho. Kefo yama haya kavala ago ayehami-taleneafe muse hiho.
Ani lole kanolatana ma mopafi kava humainea Anumayamo aule heti-mainaana tole olivi yosa kana huteana tole kani kana humainae.
Kefo yatamihe tamahaumana halesigetama aviteho. Kigima nehisaya yana neataletama kefo yatamihena ape hutama mainetama havi ya alige fataga huge hutama tamaipa haviya hutama maisae.

Nenahaiya nafuna-ganaga kefo kavala akave omalo. Kanalema humainesia kavaage akave malo. Kanale kavaage huge hugema nehaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina nafanea mainagi kefo kavaage huge hugema nehaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina oagenae.

Hagoteno augafa laga ohuneno Anumaya Koti kea havino agupi maleno ametitia humainea yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago kanoa mainane.” hunoma hutenea yafema veamoya havisaya yafe augafa laga humaine. Ani yafe mukiamoya amaugafa laga ohuneya Apalahamuma humainea kava huya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatenesia veamoya Apalahamuna aginagomoya mainae.
Fali-mainesia kanomona kefo yamoa nagoene atafa ohugahie. Hai falimaine.
Nagi Yisasia fali-mainefiti heti-mainea haimumoa tagai taugafale hanenageya agesayafe “Yisasina haesunageno falisie.” huya hutenaya kavala menia ania huya tahaeya faligahe nehae.
Mukia veamoya amakaiami yatefekeya amakesa nehavigi Yisasi Kalaisi aliyatefena amakesa nohaviye.

Higeno aamoa Salae namo a maineanagino Anumaya Kotia Nafanekaa ategane. huno hu lokiya vaino huteanagi Apalahamua kosuna leno maineanagi ani kehena Tamage hanafe hana yana afaa hugane. huno havino agupi maleno ametiti hu-maineafe nafanea atene.

Hu-na-tenea kanomoma haisia kavama hisuana maa hu-maine naminea veanefitila nagoke kanoa fanane ohisagena ma mopama hanoma hisia kanafina mukia fali-mainesafiti ali he-ti-matesugeya agola maige maige hugahae.

Timotina hutogeno tamakaite uteno tamakaila nelama-taleno tagaitega evayi huno kanale ke alino tamakaifena mage huno melahapaiye Amakaya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya yana tokiyaage huya atafa hulineya mukia veafe hamau amayamopafi nehamaigeya mukia yupa tagaifena amakesa havi havi huya amaipa haviya kanaleya hu nelatae. Tagayama amakaila amakesuna yafema nelahaiya kava huya tagesaya yafena aluya huno nehamaiye. huno tahapaiye.
Naama hisaya yateti sipi sipiyagale uhagote mainea kava kanoma evayi hinunofena tokiya hale yamaa hanea amuse yana agola hanege hanege hisia yanagino tamamigahie.
Ani kemoa “Agola hanege hanege hugahie.” huta tametitima nehuna yafe kolia huta fala okita ani kegeya huhaleta nehune.

Ohunagi mani havigeage kema hu-mave-neliya vayamoya yaga kafamoma hia kava huya amaku amakesa omale vayalagiya amaugafa age hamaye hisaya kavaage nehaya vayamoya hamaesageya falisaya yafe itaamimoya amatenae. Agelama ohunaya yafena kamuge hatageya vai neamateya havi kavala nehayanagi anima amakaiami nehaya kavamo hamaesigeya faligahae.
Mani kea moneamima omalenea veafena hauma hu-nea-matea yafena nohigi mukia kanalela monema hanea kutela agaia yagai-maineno musufa yama nehia yafe mani kea hu-maine.

Anumaya Kotima tagaifema hau ayamopafima nehaiya yana ago havilama huta tagupi malenone. Anumaya Kotia tahau tayamopafima nelahaiya yamona aepaa mainegi hamau amayamopafima nehamaiya veamoya Anumaya Kotiene tokaeya maigeno Anumaya Kotia amakaiene tokaeno maine.

Sitivenina hayageno falitegeya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamogamina ali-haviya humatageya faleya alu kote kote ute ete humainae. Nagoa veala faleya Fonisia umaigeya nagoa veala faleya Saipalusi umaigeya nagoa veala faleya Atioku kumate umaineya Anumayamo kea Yuta veamogamike hamapai-mainagi alu veamogamina hamaopainae.
Havi amakesa nehaviyanagi tamage tagaya Anumaya Koti ke akave nemaleta ali-mainona yafeke muse nehuta Alu yaenena nagoene alisune. huta nohuna yafena tusia muse huta maigahune.

Hu neamategeno Anumaya Kotia atalegeno Yisasina amakua aminaya veanene tua huno amakaseteno mukia alu kote alu kote veanene, alu make lu make neaiya veanene, alu maugafa lu maugafa kalimai veanene, kava humatesia tokiya amigeno kava yagaino maine.

Tamakayama kefo kavama nehisageya kayoma lamamisagetama tamamena malefalu hutama tamagata yama alitetama maisayana ani yamoa afa ya kana hu-mainegi muse yana aligahafi? Aao oaligahae. Tamakaya kanale kavama nehisageya kayoma tamamisageno tamaku tamamemoa ako huno maisiana Anumaya Kotia ani kavafena tusia muse hu-lamategahie.

Mukia Anumaya Kotia kema higeya agaialegama umainaya veafena Anumaya Kotia Maa tamahaimu tamamigahue. huno hu-maineanagino maige maige hisaya hamaimu alisayafene huno Kalaisia Anumaya Kotiene veanene amunotifi maineno haegafama alino hagelafila-tenea kemona ali lokiya vai-malene. Nayoma alino hagelafi-matenea kema akave malenaya veamoya kefo yama hu-mainaya yaamimoa aigagimategeya mainaya nofipiti amavayu hisiafe miyana ataleno Kalaisia fali-maine.
Tagaya na ke hugahune? Tagaya kefo yama hisunagenoa Anumaya Kotia kayone hisuna yamaa tagaipina ala huno havatelatesie huta hisuno?

Moli huliteya hisaya yafena tamakesa ohavitama havi kigi humatesaya kea ohutama aifonafo augafa kea ohutama ani kavama hisaya kavamoa Anumaya Koti nafanemogami kavala omalene. Anumaya Kotia lamaminea yafe Anumayamotega nunamu kefiti muse higetao. hutama hiho.

Higena agoana nagola kanileta hosi afua agogeno ani afumo agupifi maiya kanomo agia “Vaya fali yamoe.” huya neayaya kanomo akavema via kanomo agia “Fali-mainaya veane nevaya kumale.” huya agia neayaya kanomoa akave vigeana vaana ani tole kanolatamogania tusia tokiya anamigeana mukia ma mopafi mainaya veala ali fako huana foafi (4) amatageya maiya anagapiti nagoa veamogamina he-falimatesia tokiyaania ali-mainae. Aliageya nagoamoya tu huteya fali-mainagi nagoamoya kafu huya amakategeya fali-mainagi nagoamoya alu kali lu kali aliya fali-mainagi afai kalamoya nagoamogamina hamaesageya falisaya tokiyaania ali-mainae.

Anumaya Kotia hulokiya vai-malenea kemoa kayone nehia yamaaleti falote hisiafeene mukia Apalahamuna aginagomoya alisaya yafeene “Agaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti aligahae.” huno humaine. Kahegi kema akave nemalaya veamoyage oaligahagi taginagomoa, Apalahamuma, ametiti humainea kava hisuna veamogatina Apalahamua nealafa maine.

Lomu vayamoya kenima haviyana nagaipina nagoa nahaesagena falisua kenia omalegeya natalegahe hayanagi Yuta vayamoya ani kehena ‘Aao huya haya yafe nagoma visua kania omalegena ‘Sisa kaiyekenia havisie.’ huna humainoanagi nagaini nofi vayala kaiyeke humatesua yana omalene.

Naa humaineafe Anumaya Kotia kalagi aisia yana veamoya “Namisie namisie.” huya nehuya veamoya “Nayamufa aina aliya alisuafe kalagila ainategahie.” huya hisaya yatetila kalagila aioamategahie. Anumaya Kotia “Ma kanomofe nenahaiyanagina kalagi aitegahue.” huno hisia kanomona hau huno kalagila aineate.
Nagoa veamoya kumai haya yateti nagoke yupa tueti tali tausenia (23,000) veane fali hano humainae. Naa humainayafe tagaya kumai kavala ohisune.

Nehaigenoagi naulaga, nagesa, nayamoa mukia naugafamoa kefo yama hisaya amakesa huteya nagupima haneno Anumaya Kotifema nehaiya nagu nagesaene tu nehuya naugafamona kefo yamoya avaleya nofipi hayagiya ateteya “Tagai ke havio.” huya nehae.

Kalaisifema hagoteya huge huge hu-mainaya kehena neataleta ko hu-mainaya veane maisune. Havigu noma atafa nehia posiage ayete yete hu-maleta maisunana nona falote ohugahie. Ma augafa kea atalesune.
