Mukia nafunaganagatama musetami nehugi Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi hulatenea yafeene Avamumoma tahau tayamopafi nelahaiya yama taminea yafeene lamahavi-negoe tokiya vaitama nagaifena ke hutama Anumayamotega havigegeno nagaila naya hino.
Higeya melitalu hu-mainaya veamoya mage huya hae “Kefo avamumo kagaila kagusafina maineno kavale-liteno nehie. Taya kahaegahena nehageka nehane?” huya hae.

Tagaya kefo yama huna yafena Anumaya Kotia aipa haviya hulateno vea amaulagafi “Yisasiga faligane.” huno hutegeno me falitegeno kolamaamoa elavi-mainea yafema havita tagupi maleta tametiti hunageno Anumaya Kotia aigetateno kefo yatia atalelatene. Anumaya Kotia nayona kefo yama humainaya veala amakata aisia yana anonaamia aupaa oamaminegi Yisasi Kalaisina hutegeno me falimainea yateti Anumaya Kotia agaia fatago kavama hia yana taveli-maine.
Tusia yasimo higeya aliya vayaene ati vayaene ata kae-taleya he-tiya tota huya mainageno Pitaa amakaiene atale he-tino augafa tota huno maine.
Lamakaya Satania havige havage me hunoma aye-lamavataga lamavatagoma hisia savale kemoa tamatafa ohisie mukia Anumaya Kotia tamaminea yana tuma hisaya halegula aye hailiho.
Higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Alaniamogae nagaya na ya hinagena menia kakavela ougahe hugeka nehane? Nagaya kagaifene huna nahaimula atalegahue.” huno hie.
Havigesayana Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama mainesageno tamaipa falu hisia yama tamamisiana mukia alu yamo amaipa falu yana agase-mainea falu yamaamoa tamaku tamakesalela yagailamategahie.
Tavefunamokeya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehunoagi Anumaya Kotia agaia augafa kali-mainea veanema talo hulatenea veafenagi ani lavefunamoa hu-haviya hu neate.

Yisasi kema nohaviya veamoya kumai nehaya veanene amakaiamiahekeya amakesa haviya “Nagainia mukia yana alisue.” huya nehaya veanene havige huya musufayama nehaya veanene ago fali-mainaya veafe “Anumayati mainae.” huya amakisana nevaiya veanene mukia mopale mainayafe ani veanene tokaetama omaiho huna hisugetama hanate haote yatela maisae? Yisasi kema nohaviya veafena mani kea ohunoe.
Nayona nagaya “Nasaleti Yisasi agia alina mopafi atalesugeno lavisie.” huna alu kava alu kavala humatenoe.

Mukia kanafina amaulagamoa aneyagalegageya vigeya kumai hesaya amakesa haviteya kefo kava hisaya yaamia oatalenae. Yisasife haviya amaku amamena ali lokiya ovaiya mainaya veamogamina amavayu huya Kefo kava hiho. huya nehae. Alu kanomo yate age hamaye nehuya amaku amakesa havige havige nehae.

Nago kanomoa yagaiteno mone nealia kanoa sipi sipimona nefaa omaine. Omaigeno afela kalamoma egenoa ani kanomoa ataleno falegeno ani afela kalamoa sipi sipimogamina akafu amanino mo hamae me hamae higeya faleya atagufeya alulega ute ete nehae.
Nahau nayamopafi nahau-mainea nafunagana-gatama kema hisaya kea aupaa haviho. Ke ohutama mainetama aupaa tamahaiya ovaino.
Naama hayana Yisasi kanale mono kema hamanepaiya vayafena Anumayamoa mage humaineane “Mono ketamima havisaya veamoya anonaa kenatamia kavetamia tamamisae.” huno humaineane.
Nagayama ma mopalema emainoana hale ya kana huna emainoe. Nagoke nagoke veamoya nagaifema haviya amakupima maleya amametitima hisayana haniki-mainea yapina omaigahae.

Haenagaa Yisasia kanale hu-tenea kanomona mono nopi mainegeno mogeteno mage hie “Kagaya ago menia kalikaa hano hu-ga-tegeka kanale huka mainanagi kefo kavala nagoene ohuo. Kefo kavama hisanana nagoa kana ya aligane.” huno hie.
Nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi nelahainage-tama mukia kavala hiho.
Mani kea huteno mage hie “Tamakaya nagaifema tamahau tamayamopafima tama-haisigetamahena tamaha-pai-mainoa kemona akave malegahae.

Menima kema nehia kanomo kea, Yisasi kema, akavela omalesagi kayeho. Nayona Anumaya Kotia mopale kanoa Mosese avayafiti, kema higeya akavema omalaya veala kayo kevea amamineanagino menia ikapinagati ea kema nehia kanomo kea ohavinesamogatama tahaokela ohegahianagino tusia kayo tamigahie.
Hagotetama Anumaya Kotina oagenayanagitama afa yafe Anumayatimoe. hutama agisana vaimainaya yamoa nofi hu-lamategetama mainayane.

Mukia manima humainaya kemoa falote huno tamage hisia yafe Anumaya Kotia agaia aliya nafaneamona alino hetitegetama tamakaya kefo yatamihe tamakua aiyahae hisageno tamaya huno kanale manua tamamisia yafe hagoteno tamakaitela hutegeno emaine.” Pitaa mage huno humaine.
Kanale humategeta tagaya mukia Yuta veama mainalegaene Yelusalemuene humainea kavala taulagafiti age-mainona ke tamahanepaune. Ani kava higeya yafaga yosale asaimalageno fali-maine.
Nafunagana-gatama Alatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi agile tokiyaage kea tamahanepauve. Nagoa tamakesa havitama alu ke alu kea ohutama apaohetama mainetama nagoke tamaku tamakesale maiho huna tamahanepauve.
Nayona tamaku tamakesamoa kame hutesaya kava higetama kefo yana maitama nehutama Anumaya Kotienena kame hutenae.

Neyavemoya haya kava huka age kahaye hisana kagu kagesa ohavika kakaveno huto. Maifalu ohuka fatago kavakeya nehisanageya oniyaami omalenesia amakualeti nunamu nehisaya veamoyaene Anumayamofena havitama tamakupi nemaletama tamafu tamakanafena tamahau tamayamopafi nelama-hainagetama tamaipa falu yapi maisaya yafe tamaya mukiki hiho.

Anumaya Kotia Kalaisiene tamakaila ago alino hetilamateno haegafa tamahaimula ago tamamine. Tamamineafe tamakaya anafinagati alisaya yafe tamakesa havi havi hutama maiho. Anafinaga Yisasia Anumaya Kotina tamaga ayatega hanea siale maine.

Hagote ensole kanomoa agaia ufena higeno komopamoene atamoene kolamoene atagufe-lavino mopafi tavigeno mukia ma mopa tagufale (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nagokema ali fako hu-malaya haupa kaiyaga mukia mopafi hanea yaene mukia yosayagaene mukia apeene atamoa teno asagali-talene.
“Vae Anumaya Kotigae tusia tokiyakaa haneanagika nayona mainananagika menia mainananagika tusia tokiyakaleti aepa heka mukia yatela kava neyagaina yafe tagaya kagaifena tusia musekaa nehune.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Kagaya Anumaya Kotima amuse yama kamisia yafema havimainateasina tifena nagaila nahavi-gateasine. Tima namio hia kanoma nagemainateasina tifena nahaviganagena maige maige hisana tina kamuleasine.” huno hie.
Hanegeno Kalaisia tamahaimumo aepaa fufutema evayi hisigetama tamakaiene tokiya hale yamaafi umaigahae.

Okaenoanagi manima kae-maloa kea tamakaife huno Yisasia, Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoa, tagu tamema ali-gatisia kano maine hutamama havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima hisaya yafe kae-malenoane. Ani yafe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisayana Yisasi agileti agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula aligahae huna kae-malenoe.

Nehaviyanagi tagaya Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga mainone. Anumaya Kotina agelama nehaya veamoya tagai kea nehaviyanagi Anumaya Kotia oamatenea veamoya tagai kea nohaviye. Ani kavama nehaya yafe ke-lamage Avamumoma nehia kene havigeage avamumoma nehia kene havilama huta ago havilinone.

Tamakaya Yisasina tamakuama aminaya veamogatama agaife nehavitama kave negahema melitalu nehayana ani kefo vayamoya emaineya osagopu vayalagiya amakaiamihekeya amakesa havi havi huya neneya tamakaye hisifa kava huya ani kavema naya kavela ali haviya nehae. Naa vayamoya siamoma aye hani huteno kola oaino laga hulino ute ete higeno afa koma titalea kava higeya ani vayala afa ya kana vaya mainae. Yosamoa alagama ayesia kanamoa falote hianagi alagama noayea yosamoma hia avamete huya mainageno amakaipina nagola kanale yana falote ohune. Avinamoa omalegeya hafuyaene tagasi huya vakai-talageno fayote-mainea yosa kana huya maineya kanale kema tamaya hisaya kea omalegeya havi kavala maiya nehae.
Tokiya avameyama humainea yafe mukia kalima hamaeya veala amavaleya kate amateya hagifanale maineya mage hae “Pitama esiana agai amemo me halatu hamaesigeno kanale humategahie.” huya kate momatenae.

Mukia mani yana alitetama Yisasife tamakupi malenaya yamoa halegu kana hinageno Satanima ata nelea kevema hesigeno esia katela tamakupi malenaya tamametitimoa halegu kana hu-maineafe maleno tilegahianagino anima ata nelesia kevema meye su hugahie.
Mukia yama hisaya yana alitama tokiyaage hutama aliho. “Ma mopafi afa vayamogami aliyana noalunagi Anumayatimo aliya nealune.” hutama aliho.

Kayetama mainetama Isoa nayoma humainea kavala ohiho. Isoa nagoke yupa nesia kavefe haviteno mukia kanafima kanale yama alino maisia yama nefaa amisia yafena agesa ohavino Aoteyamaae. huno humainea kavala ohiho. Havigu nagoamogatama Anumaya Kotifena Haoteyamaae. hutama nehisagetama nagoamogatama alu kanomo anea amavayu ohiho.
Hama-vigegeya ala kefiti mage huya hae “Agaila neataleka Palapasina tamisane.” huya hu-mainae. Palapasia vaya nehamaeno musufa yamaage hume hume nehaiya kano mainea kanohe hu-mainae.

Havigu ke nehatageya anagamimo-gamifena kame vayaamia hamapaigahae. Amakesa ohaviya aupaa kefo kavala nehuya tusiya huya amaugafa alisaga nehuya tusiya huya hamayema hisia yafena havime havime nehaiyanagi Anumayamofena nohamaiye.
Naama higenofena Anumaya Kotia anale avalesaga huno ateteno nago agia malene. Ani agimoa mukia veamogami amakia amakase-mainea agia malene.

Tagaya Yisasi Kalaisina tokiyaaene esia avageaenema tamahapai-mainonana tagesafiti havigu-nagu ke akave nemalona kea tamaha-opainonagi tagaya alu aotage tokiya hale yamaa agaite hanegeta taulagafiti ageteta tamahanepaune.

Poloa mani kea Yisasima eteno esia yafe huno mukiama kae-malenea avopina ania huno kaeno tamahapai-maine. Nagoa agaiama kae-malenea avopina havilama huta ohavisuna augafa ke hanegeya ani kema haviyama hatayo hataya nehaya veanene havilama nohaya kene mukiama Anumaya Koti avopima kae-malenaya kene aliya aiyahae huya hu haviya huya neataleya alu kate kate nevae. Naa augafa kavama nehaya yafena haniki-mainea kumapima tegelege nehia atafi agola ugahae.

Hunategahe nehageana Aposolo kanolatamogania Pologani Panapasigania mani kea haviteana “Havi kava hugahe nehae.” huana kenaania ali hatata hutaleana anima alitalu humainaya veamogami amunopi anaiyayeana vaayamogani ala kefiti mage hae “Nelaafugatamae naa higetama mani kavala nehae? Taagaya vayatafa mainoagi tamakai kana hutaa mopale vaya mainoe. Kanale mono kea tamahapaigahe taagaya emainoe. Afa kava hutama haimula omale manimo agi alisaga nehagi ani kavala neataletama tamakua aiyahae hutama Anumaya Kotina tamakua amitafa hiho. Ani Anumaya Kotia ofalisia kano maine. Ikaene mopaene hageliene talo humalene. Mukia ani lipi mainaya kafayagaene ikatega mainaya namaene mopale mainaya afuene veanene talo humaleneane.

Tamahapauve Anumaya Kotia Yuta veamogati taginagomogamife hamapai-mainea kemoa falote huno fatago hinageya “Anumaya Kotia tamageage kano maine.” huya hisayafene huno Kalaisia Yuta veamogamina amaya humaine.
Haneanagi Tagaya kanaleya huta tametitia nehune. huya hisayana veamoya amavefunamona kava oyagaiya amakaiami amakuamona havige ayevataga nehayanagino amametiti nehaya yamoa afa ya kana humaine.

Nagaya mage huna ago tamaha-pai-mainoe ‘Aliya kanoamoa kava kanoamona oagasene.’ huna hu-mainoane. Ani kehe tamakesa havitama maiho. Nagoa veamoya nagaima, tamakai kava kanotamimonima, aliya haviyama hu-na-taya kava huya ania huya tamakaila aliya haviya hu-lama-tegahayanagi nagoa veamoya nagai kema haviya akave nemalesaya veamoya tamakai kea ania huya haviya akave malegahae.
Yisasia amakupima maleya amametitima haya Yuta vayafena mage hie “Tamakaya nagai kema mukia kanafima akavema malesayana nagai ke havisaya anagania maigahae.
Hutetegeno mainegeno Isipi kotegaene Kenani kotegaene nagola tusia kafu haya kana efalote higeya tototimogamina kaveamia omalegeya tusiya huno amakala lemainae.
Nagaya nagoa nafaneyagaka-moya Nelafama tagaifena Mani kema akave maleho. huno hu-mainea kate maleya Anumaya Kotina kelamage keama akave nemalaya yafe havitena tusia muse nehue.

Nagoa veamoya amakaiami konaga afamoma kanale kava huya oamatesayana amakupima malenaya kea amakaveno huteteya tusia havi kava nehuya Yisasi kema ohavinaya vayamoyama havi kavama nehaya kavala agaseya tusia havi kavaage nehae.

Na yafe tole lagesa ohavita Anumaya Kotife havita lagupi maleta tametiti hu-mainonafe taugafamona nunu alagaage humainea titeti sese hu-lateneanagita Anumaya Koti avatela umaigetao. Yisasi kolateti tagupina aihatali hatali hu-malegeno oniyaagela ohuneanagita tagupina Kefo yama huna yamoa hane. huta havita kana hisuna yana ago ali-talene.

Naugosa oageya nagaifena mage huya havimainae Nayona Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti nehuna veamogatina kayo keve nelamia kanomoagi menia kanaleya huno Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kea huhaleno nehie. huya hageya havimainae.

Lokiyaage ke nagaya tamahanepauve ‘Kavela neho.’ huna nehue. Kavela netetama tokiya aligahae. Tamage lamahanepauve mukiamogatama kanale hutama uvayi hugahae. Nagoke kanoa fanane ohugahae.” huno humaine.
Tamakaya nagai nagima alilinageya ali haviyama hulamatayanagi kasalola otamahaenegi lokiya vaitama mainaya yafena ago tamake-mainoe.

Vayatamamo-gamina mage huka hamapaiyo Havi lina netama aneginagia ohiho. Tamaku tamakesale yagaitama tokiyaage hiho. Yisasife havitama lamakupi malenaya yatela tokiya vaitama maiho. Veafena tamahau tamayamopafi nelamahaisia kavaage hiho. Kana yama falote hulamatesigetama tokiyaage hutama hetiho. huka huo.

Nayona Anumaya Koti aepaa mukia veamoya ohavinayanagino Anumaya Kotia kasagoya kea ohuneane. Nagi menia mukia ma mopale veafena tokiyaage ke huno mage hie “Tamakua aiyahae hutama nagaitega eho.” huno humaine.
Hageya Yisasima asai-malenaya yafaga yosamo avatela Yisasina itaamoene nunaamoene he-ti-mainae. Anakaiene Kalopasina aamoa Maliaene hamoamoa Magatala kumate Maliaene he-ti-mainae.
Agaiama fai-linea kolamoa ayaaya kenaale tusiya hu-mainegeno Anumaya Koti aepama hugafino humainea yafe agima ayayana “Anumaya Kotina keae.” huya agia ayemainae.

“Afaa anumayamogami amamiya afua negahune.” hutama hisaya yafena kayeho. Havigu Yisasifena amakuamoa tokiya ovainesia veamoya ageteya nesayana “Kefo ya nehune.” huya havigu asaga hulaviyafenagi kayeho.

Yisasia fali-mainefiti ago ali hetiteneafe eteno falino komufinaga mo okasalisiafene huno nayona Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaineane “Tevitina ‘Hano ohu manua kanale manu kamigahue.’ huna humainoa manua tamakaila tamamigahue” huno humaineane.
Mainesageno Alu Aotage Avamumoma esia kanafina nagaya Nenafaene mainoanagitama tamakaya ania hutama nagaienena maisagena nagaya ania huna tamakaienema mainoa yafena havilama hutama havigahae.

Hanaa huta Yisasina tagua amitafa hu-mainesuna yafena havisune? Anumaya Kotia kahegi malenea kema akave malesunana tamage huta Tagua amitafa hu-mainone. huta nehuta agaila ago age-mainone huta hugahune.

Naafene nagaya tamakaila ago tamaha-pai-mainoe ‘Tamakaitami kefo yatamia oatalesageno hanesigetama faligahae.’ huna hu-mainoane. Tamakaifema nagaya ‘Maa kano mainoe.’ huna hu-mainoa kehe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima ohisayana kefo yatamia oataletama hanesigetama faligahae.” huno hie.

Kaegenama agoana ani amoa mukia Anumaya Kotina alu aotage veanene, Yisasima hulatenea mono kema hamanepaiya veanene hamaegeya fali-mainaya veamogami kolana ani amoa valu valu huno neteno havilima neteya anegi-nagima nehaya kava higena agetena atali talu nehugeno namayoa aimaine.
Isoa haenaga agesamoa akalo higeno nefaa manuma amisia yafena tusiya huno avia ateanagi nefaa aganaamo ani manua ago amineanagino agua aiyahae huno Isona manuma amisia kamaa omalegeno manua oamine.
Hamanepaigeno Anumayamoa tokiyaaleti amaya higeya kasagoya veamoya amakua aiyahae huya Anumayamo ke haviya amakupi maleya amametitia humainae.
Haneanagi Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia hulatenea yamo falisuna yana ago agase-maineafe Anumaya Koti agia alisaga huta muse hisune.

Nafaneamima vayaamima omainesia keto aneyagama amakaiamige maisayana hamamao huna nehue. Ani keto anemoya kanaleya huya Anumayamofe amakesa haviya Laya hugahie. huya amametiti nehageno Anumayamoa amakaima hamamaesia yafena nateene kegeene Anumayamotega ke huya havinegagi tamakaya amaya hiho.
Nayoene meniene nagaifena nehutama nagia ayetama nagoke yafena Nenafana haviokenayane. Nagi menia muse yatamimoma tamakupina hiya huno hanesia yafena nahavigegena tamamino.”

Anumayamoa hapali-lamatenea yupa nofipi mainetama miya oalisaya aliya nealitama mainageno ani aliyana afaa aliho. Aligahagi kava kanotamimoa “Menia nofila huotamategahugi afaa lamatalegahue.” huno hisigetama muse nehutama afaa ugahae.
Hu-mainayanagi anima Yisasi kehena havigegeyama nehaya vayamoya Yisasina amakuama aminaya veamogamina ali-pasema-talageya mopafi yafekeya amakesa nehavigeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakaienena nomaiye.
Kalaisia kayone yamaaleti agaitegama visaya yafene huno Anumaya Kotia ke higetama agaitega vayanagi aupaa agaila neataletama alu mono kema haviya yafena nagaila tusiya huno namayoa neaiye.
Mukia veanenena falu hutama maisaya yafe tamakesa nehavitama tamaya mukiki hutama alu aotage veane maiho. Fatago huya omaisaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina oagetafa huya oagegahae.

Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya kukonagona tipi kalemona tamaga kaiyagamo haikanagati hagayu hutama malesayana noyamea aligahae.” huno hama-paigeya kukonagona ania huya hagayu hayana tusia noyame aligeno kanaage higeya alisaga hisaya yafena tusia ya hu-mainae.
Taugafa laga nehaya yano taga ohunaya yano ani tole yamoa afa ya hanegi Anumaya Koti kema havita akave malesuna yana kanale yanagino aepaa hane.

Nagoa veamogamina vea amaku amakesa ali hetimatesaya tokiyama amaminesiana ali tokiya vaiya ani amaku amakesa ali hetimatesae. “Nafunaganagamima nago yama amamigahue.” huno humainesia tokiyama amaminesiana kasagoya male kosa heya amamiho. Kava aliya alisaya tokiyama amaminesiana amakualeti ani kava aliyana aliya maiho. Hauma huteno afuaganama ayama hisia tokiyama amaminesiana amaipa falu yapiti amaya hiho.

Amaketeno mage huno hamavike “Yisasife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya kanafina Alu Aotage Avamula ali-mainafi oalinae?” huno hamavigegeya “Aao, ‘Alu Aotage Avamula maine.’ huya haya kea ohavinone.” huya hae.
Mani avopima kae-malona kea nagoa veamoya akave omalesayana Ma kanomo mani kavala nehie. hutama amakaienena tokaetama omaitama aluale maigeya amakayea hino.
Nafunagana-gatama tamahanepauve mopafi taugafamoa Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea kumatela ougahianagino kasalino fanane hisia taugafamoa agola maige maige nehaya kumatela outafa huno ougahie.

Tamakaya kasalisia kavefena maitama ati oayeho. Maige maigema hisaya kavefeke maitama atiyeho. Nagaya Nenafaa, Anumaya Koti hu-na-tenea kanomona ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona mani kavela tamamigahue.” huno hie.
Alisaya yafema Anumaya Kotitega ke hutama havigayana tamakuamoa havi lamaku tamakesa havitama tamakaitami age lamahaye hisaya yamaage alisaya yafema havigayana anima havigaya yana noaliye.
Mukia kanafina tamakaya Anumayatimo, Yisasi Kalaisiene ali lokaetama agai agi neayetama Anumaya Koti, Nelafatega mukia yafena muse huteho.
Anumaya Koti autamafina Apalahamufe mage huno humaine Apalahamua Anumaya Kotife havino aguafi maleno ametiti higeno Anumaya Kotia Kagaya fatago kano mainane. huno huteneane. huno humaineane.

Agogeno ani ala kumatela yagemoene ikamoene aivasa hisia aliyaania omalegi Anumaya Kotina tokiyaage hale yamaamo ani kumatela tusiya huno aivasa hu-maigeno Sipi sipi nafanemoa ani kumate kanila maine.
Nagi alinoma asasae-talenea Isaleli veala akopayagamoyama ke nohavia yaamima atalesagenoa Anumaya Kotia eteno alino aigamaematesia tokiyaa hanegeno eteno amavaleno me maleno aigamaemategahie.
Amategeya ani veamoya havige ohu vealagiya nagoa kefoamia omaleneane.

Nehagi nago yafe kea hu-falote huna kahapaisue. Amakayama “Alu kategae.” huya nehaya kama, Yisasi kema nehaviya veamoya akave nehaya kana, taginagomoya nevaya kate neuna Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuna mukia kahegi kene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogami kene havina nagupi malenoe.

Nago yana tamamitageya “Haenagaa tamamigahune.” hutama humainesaya yana aupaa amamiho. Tamafu-tamakanagamina tamakua amamitama amaya hiho. Nagoa veamoya amafu-amakanama amakuama amamisayana mukia kahegi kemona akave nemalae.
Amasagaligeyagi veama kefo yamo anonaamima amamisia tokiyaama hanea Anumaya Koti agia aye haviya nehayanagiya amakua aiyahae huya Anumayamo agia alisaga ohunae.

Neagogeno ani ala kumatela kegiya anayapi hu-malageno hane. Ani kegiya kovefina tuelufua (12) fiana hane. Ani fiamo amete ametela ensole veala hetiya maite maite humainae. Ani fitatela tuelufua (12) Isaleli nofi veamogami amakia kae-malenae.

Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenae Yafaga yosale asai-mainaya vayamoya Anumaya Kotia kayo keve amamisigeya faliteya haniki-mainea yapi ugahae. huya avona kae-malenae. Mosese kahegi kema mukia akave nomalonafe nofipi maineta haniki-mainea yapi ugahunagi tagaiti ani kefo kava nehuna anonaa Yisasia alino yafaga yosale faliteno mani nofi ali kalu hetalesia yafe miya hutalene. Yafaga yosale asai-malenaya yafe Yisasife mage huya nehae Anumaya Kotia kayo keve amigeno faliteno haniki-mainea yapi ugahie. huya hu-mainae.
Nayona nagaya Yuta veamogami mono ke havitena akave malena Anumaya Koti anagala nahauna hu oamatena hamae hano hugahe aluya huna ali haviya hu neamatoa navagea ago havimainae.

Elaviaamo ani osifavea metafa humaine. Ani osifavea ehe kanafima mainea osifavea kame kanotigino agia Satanie. Ani Satanina metafa huno tokiyaage seni nofila kiteteno anima ayoma omale komufina asaga huno vai-taleteno avaya tileno tokiyaage hutegeno Satania vani tausenia (1,000) kafu ani komufina nofipi maineanagino ani kanafina veamogamina havigea aye mavataga ohugahianagino vani tausenia (1,000) kafuma hano hutesigenoa ani komufitila atalesigeno aupa kana kanoafi ute ete hugahie.
Muse hayanagi ani kumatela nago kanomo agia Saimonie “Nagaya tusia ala kano mainoe.” huno tokiya avame yana higeya mukia Samelia veamoya ageteya tusia amamayo neaiyane.

Nagaila nago yafeke nenahaiye. Kalaisina agelama huna agetena fali-mainefitima heti-mainea tokiyaahena havina atafa hulisua yafe nenahaiye. Agaiene ailokaena augafa agatama aimainea yana alitena agaiene nagoke avamete huna falisua yafe nenahaiye.

Anumaya Koti aliya alisie. huka nehanafe nago kanomo anute kaya maleka ani aliyatela aupaa alika heti oato. Agelama huteka ali hetito. Havigu nagoa vayamogami kefo yaamimo kagaipi eyafenagi kagaya fatago kavakeya huka maiyo.
Ania huka alekano-gamifena hamapaiyo Anumaya Kotina haisia kava nehutama alumo kea alitama atifi mafi ohiho. Havilina netama aneginagia ohutama kanale auava kavakeya amaveliho. huka huo.
Ani yafe nago kanomoa hage-malenesia aama alitesiana kanale kava nehianagi nago kanomoa hage-malenesia aama ali oatesiana tusia kanale kava hugahie.
Kanale kema havitetama akave omalesayana afa ya kana nehagi afaama havitetama atalesayana tamakaitami tamaku nafanemona aye vataga nehae.
Ani kanafina Yutia kotega vayamoya haesaya amakesa haviya yafe Yisasia Yutia vai-oayeno Kalili kotega ute ete huno maine.

Anumaya Kotia agaia “Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama maiho.” huno nagopi alino ailokaelateneafe Yisasi Kalaisia tagaya havisuna tagu tagesamona aepaa maine. Yisasia hulatenea yateti Anumaya Kotia havi yapitila ago miya hulateneno tagaifena “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulateteno alu aotage auava yama hisuna tokiyaa tamine.
Fai-lineno tina alino yopafi taki-maleneno aepa heno agaia tuelufua (12) anagaamogami amaiya agupia sese hu neama-teno ai-gagi-linea taulileti alino hau hu-neamate.
Nagaya nayona Yisasi akave nehaya veala tusiya huna ali haviya humatetena hamaena fali-mategahe venenene anene amatafa huna nofiteti kisalu kimatetena nofipi amavalena amatenoane.
Ani veamoya agaifena tolefi ali fako huya alu ke alu ke nehae.

Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi malenaya veala sipi sipimo hia kava huya tamayapi mainagi anima mainaya veala kava yagai-mateho. Kava aliyatamihe nagoa vayamoya Naa hiho. huya hu-lamatafa hu-mainaya kehenomagi Tahaiya aliyanagita aligahune. hutama aliho. Miya alisaya yafena tamaku tamakesa ohavitama Tahaiya aliyanagita aligahune. hutama Anumaya Kotima nehaiya kava hutama aliyana aliho.
Kahegi kea akave omalonafe kefo yana nehune. Kefo yama nehuna yana akafu amanino veane hefalisia ya hane.

Haviho hoyatamifina aliya veamogami miyaamia nagoa miyaamia havige hu-matetama noamamiya miyaamimoa hu falote hu-lamateno ke nehie. Anima aliya vayatamimoya kema nehaya kemoa Anumaya Kotia, mukia yamona tusiya huno kava humainea kanomo, agesafina hai falegeno ago haviline.
Naa haya yafe tamakaya mukia kefo kavaene, vaya havi kema hu-matesaya yaene, vagala kavaene, alumogami yatefe agetama tamahaye nehaya yaene, nelamafu-gami hu-haviya humate yaene mukia ataleho.

Aneyaga velema faitesageno anauamoma ofalino afaa mainesigenoa nagopi mai hapaino maineno amoa ataleno alu vele ovisie. Anauamoma falitesigenoma “Alu kanole maigahue.” huno hisiana kanale hugahianagi Anumayamoene mai-lokaeno mainesia vea alisie.

Ani kanolata-mogania Anumaya Kotina kelamage keamo kaana neataleana mani havigea mage hae Agoma fali-mainaya vayala hetiya maisaya kanamoa ago vayi humaine. huana nehuana Nagoa veamoya fali-mainesafitila he otigahae. huana humainaa keleti nagoa veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametitima haya yamona ali haviya nehae.

Yisasi Kalaisina tagua amiteta agaiene ailokaeta maineta Yuta vayamogami kava huta taugafa laga hisunapi taga ohisunapi ani augafa kavatalana afa ya haneanagino taya hutafa huno ohugahigi Yisasife havita lagupi maleta nelafugamife tahau tayamopafi nelahainageta amaya hisunana ani kavala tamage huno hagote yatafa hane.
Ageteno akave malelea yamo ala kanoa hapae-maineanagiya agai kema akave maleya ali hipoya hisaya veamogamina agola maige maige hisaya yamoene amaugafa aligatisia yamoene aepaa maine.
Yisasi anagala Yelusalemua mainagena amaya hisaya mone amamisaya kea hugahe hue. Kalesia kotega mainaya veamogamina hamapaugeya humainaya kavala tamakaya ania hiho.
Anemogatama Anumayamo aiyaafinaga mainetama kema akave nemalaya kava hutama anautamimo-gami kea akave maletama amaiyaafinaga maiho.

Haenagaa Yisasia mono nopi alitalu hu-mainaya vayayagahe mage hu-maine “Nagaya ma mopafi veala aye hale-ma-tesua kano mainoe. Nagai nakavema malesaya veamogatama maige maige tamahaimula hanea hale yana alitetama haniki yapina ute ete ohugahae.” huno hie.
Tamakaya nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya veamogatama Aposolo vayamoya haenagama falote hisia yafema tamahapai-mainaya kehena tamakesamoa hao hinagetama haviho.
Tagaya tayapitila nago yana haomaegahune. Agaia mukia veamogami hamaimuene mukia yama amaminea kanogita hanaa huno nago yamaa omaleneanagita aya hugahune?

Nehageta tagaya veamoyama hu falote haya kea nehavunanagi Anumaya Kotima hu-mainea kea Yisasia nagaini nafane maine. huno hu falote hunoma humainea kea veamogami kemona amakaseno ala humainea kegita havisune.
Anumayatimona Yisasi Kalaisina kenatami kana hutama avaletama taugafale aigamaetama age lamahaye hisaya yafena tamakesa havi havi hutama omaiho.
Isaleli veamoya Anumayamofe haviya amametiti haya yafe Yeliko kumate uvayima hayana sevenia (7) yupa kagi kagi nehageno yafatetima hu-malenaya kegiyamoa agaia tagape ailavi-maine.
Anumaya Kotia Polo ayapi tokiya avame yana humaine.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage hie “Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve mukia veama kefo kavama taloma hisayana kefo yaamimoa nofi hu-ma-tegeya miya oali aliya veane kana huya mainae.
Nenahaiya nafunagana-gatama haviho Anumaya Kotia ania huno tagaifena hau ayamopafima hau-mainea yafe tagaya ani kava huta nelafu-gamifena tahau tayamopafi tahaisie.
Kagaya agola maige maige hisua kana ago navelinagena age-mainoafe kagaienema maisua yafena aluya huna musena hugahue.” Teviti mani kea humaineane.
Nagaya aupaa hunama omesugekahena veamogamina Anumaya Koti avopiti kea hapalika hu haleka hamapaigeya haviho.
Mukia kanafina alu kana ya alu kana yana tagaitela falote nehigenoagi tagaila alino haviyatafana nohie. Tagesa kumo nehianagi tagesa alino haviyatafana nohie.

Ani kumate kegiya Anumaya Kotima hu-maleana ala monemo hai-mainea yafana yasipae nehaya yafateti hu-malene. Hu-maleteno ani kumatela kanileta yafateti ki-malegeno aivasa huno alave alave hia yamoa galasimoma hia kava humaine.

Neagogeya sevenia (7) ensole veamoya sevenia (7) yayaga veama ali haviya humatesaya yama atafa hu-linaya ensole vayamoya mono nopitila hati-laviya kumatega emainae. Ani veamoya oniya ohu kenamoa alave alave huno efeage humainea kena fai-lineya kanileta yafateti talo humale nofila amaifiyafale ayegalaki-lineya emainae.
Nagoa veamoya ali haviya hulamatesagetama “Ani veala alika kanale humato.” hutama Anumaya Kotitega havigeho. “Alihaviya humato.” hutama haviokeho.
Higeno aiyamoa nagola atafima kae-malageno teno tokiyaage huno hale yamaaene kanileta yafa kana nehigeno agema aiya agemoa paugegefa nehigeno ala timo agemoma neaiya avamete kava huno aimaine.

Nagaifema kahau kayamopafi kahau-mainea yana amakai amakupi malesana yafe aepakaa hu-falote huna hama-pai-mainoanagi nagoene hama-paigahue. Nagaya amakupi maisua yafe aepakaa ago hama-pai-mainoe.” huno hu-maine.
Anumaya Kotia “Nafanenia otamamigahue.” ohutafa huno ohunegi afaa lagaife huno hutegeno emaineanagino mukia yama laya hisia yaene tamigahie.

Mage huya tamahapai-mainayane Anumayamo esia kanamoa ago aupa nehisigeya nagoa veamoya Yisasima hulatenea yafe huya kigi huteteya amakaiamia amaugafamo age haye nehia kavakeya huya maigahae. huya hu-mainayane.

Ani yafe tamakaya aye sasaetalenea akopaahena “Afa veane mainagi tagaya tamakaseta ala veane mainone.” hutama hu oamateho. Tamakaya akopamogatama timaa aitama tama yosamona amigeno nonegi hafuyafiti timaa aitama nenae.

Tamakaya Anumayamofena havitama lamakupi maletama tamametiti humainaya kemona atafa hutama tokiyaage hulinayafe menia kahegi kea huta kava hu notamatonagi muse hutama tamaipa kanale yapi maisayafe mani kea nehune.
Nago kanomo agia Lasalusie kali ali-maine. Ani kanoa Petani kumate kanoe. Mataene aganaamoa Maliagani kumale.
Naa hianagiya veamoyama ani kemona amakavenoma hutenayana veamogamina amakaveno hu oamatenagi Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuama tamaminea kanomona amakaveno hutegahae.
Maa hutama agelama hiho Yisasi Kalaisia ma mopafima eana velafa emaine. huyama humainaya veamogami agetetama Amakupina Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotake Avamuamoa maine. hutama agelama hugahae.

Nehavita Yisasi kehena havigema nehaya vayala tagaiene maineya ani kavakeya nehageno himonama agaya yamoa amavaleno anegi-nagi yapi amategeya kumai yate nehuya kava vayamogami kea ohaviya ensole vayamo-gamifena hu-haviya hu neamatae.

Lamatenegi tamakaya Yisasima hulamatenea mono kema havitama tamakupi malenaya yana atafa hutama tokiya vaiho. Havigu nago yamo tamavayu hisigetama Yisasima hulamatenea kanale mono kema havilinetama tamametiti nehaya yana ataleyafenagi mai lokiya vaitama maiho. Ani kanale mono kea tamakaya havitageya mukia mopale veamoya havilinagena nagaya Polona anima Yisasi hulatenea kanale mono kemo aliya kano mainena mani kea hamanepauve.
Ani kema hia yafe yafa kayoteti aliya aiko-ligahe nehageno Yisasia fala-kino amataleno ala mono no kategati hati-lavino umaine.
Anumaya Kotia haegafa lamaku tamakesa agaia agu agesamoma hia auava kava huno fatago huno talo humalenegi havi kavala ohuno alu aotage tamaku tamakesa talo huno tamaminegi alitama maleho.
Havisayana tamakaya Yisasina tamakuama aminaya veamogatama Yisasife havitama tamakupi malenaya kea atafa hu-linetama Anumaya Koti kahegi kema akave maletama mailokiya vaitama maiho.
Mo hevaitayanagi Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti alino hetitene.
Nagaya kanalenale sipi sipi kava kano mainena sipi sipiniamogamina amaku amamemaa ali-gatisua yafe faligahue.
Anumaya Kotia Yuta vea omainaya veamogamina tamakaila agaia kayone yamaahe tamahapaisuafene huno hunatenegetama tamakaya ago havimainafi?
Nagoa veamoya mono keleti ke ovai avai huya ali haviya nehisaya veamogamina amakesa alio. Aliteka tole kanalema hisanageya kekama ohavisageka afaa neamataleka kakaveno humato.
Mani kema hia kea Yuta vayamoya haviteya tolefi ali fako hu-mainae.
Nomalagi nagoke nagoke veamoya hu-mainea kea haviya amakupima malaya yafe ‘Anumaya Kotia tamageage kano maine.’ huya hu-lokiya nevaiye.
Nahau-mainea nafunagana-gatama tamakaya ani yafema agava mainenutamahena tamaya mukiki hutama Anumayamo aufi nagoa kefo kavala ohutama ako hutama mainetama agaiene tamakuamoa falu nehinagetama maiho.

Tafu-tagana-gatama tagaya nago kene tamahapaigahune. Nunamuna mage hutama tagaifena havigeho Anumayamo kemoa tamakaipima humainea kava huno mukia kotega aiyage aiyage huno mukia veamogamite visigeya mani kehena muse huya agia alisaga hisae hutama havigeho.

Tagaya ago havimainone Yisasiene ailokaeta mainonafe Anumaya Kotia Anumayatimoa Yisasina fali-mainefiti alino hetitenea kanomoa tagaiene tamakaienena ania huno fali-mainesupitila ali hetilateno agaia mainelega tavaleno lategahie huta tagesa havimainone.
Nagoamo-gatama kali alitama mainesagenoa mono kava vayafe ke hisageya ani kali veatela nunamu me huya Anumayamo agile masavena amaugafale fale-matesae.
Maineanagino fotia (40) kafu huteno mage hie “Isaleli vayanimogamina momakegahue.” huno agesa havimaine.
Yuta vayamoya mani kanomona atafa huya hae falisaya kava hayanagi agaya Lomu kanoma mainea ke havitena ati vayaniene ani vayamogami amayapitila mo-vale-mainoe.

Hageya mukia ani kumate veamoya ala kenake nehuya Poloenema vaiyatete nehaa kanolatana tolea Masetoniati kanolatane Kaiyusiene Alisatakusiene anavayu huya alitaluma nehaya kumapi anavaleya amaiyayeya umainae.

Alu aotage kanoa fatago kavaage nehia kanomona tamakaveno huneatetama vayama hamaeno fali neamatea kanohe ‘Atalegeno eno.’ hutetama mukia veamogami hamaimumona aepaa mainea kanomona hayageno falianagi Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti alino hetitegetaa ago agetetaa mani kea tamahanepaue.
Nagoke avamete huno Alu Aotage Avamula amamine. Yisasifenema huya haviya amakupi malenayafene huno amakupima hanea kefo yaamia ago aye hami-talene.

Ani yafe mukia veamogatama Anumayamo mayaene nofi alagamo tiene nenutamahena hagotetama tamahaote tamahaote tamakua fako hutama agetetama “Kefo yana humaino?” hutama tamakesa havitetama tamakuamoma kanale hu-mainesigetamahena neho.

Nahau-mainea nafunagana-gatama Yisasifena tamakua ami hetofa hutama mai-lokiya vaitama etetama alu katela oviho. Anumaya Koti aliyamoa afa ya kana ohuno kanale anonaa alisaya aliya haneafenagitama mukia kanafina Anumayamo aliyana tokiyaage vaitama aliho.
Mainoa yafe nagayama nemauva auava kavala agetetama akave maletama maiho.

Anumaya Kotia tusia kanale haviyaa hanea kanogino agaia haiya kava huno “Ma mopafi veamoya amakaiami haviyaamima hanea yateti nagaila nagelama huya onagegahae.” huno huteno haiya agesa mage huno havimaine “Yisasia hulatenea yafena kanale mono kea, huhaletama hamapaiya kema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamogamina amaku amamena aligatigahue.” huno humaine.

Tamakaya velema mainesaya anemogatama anautamimo-gamina amaiyaafi maiho. Anautamimoyama Yisasife haviya amakupima omalesagetamahena ani yafena nago kea ohutama amaiyaafima mainaya kavafena ageteya Yisasifena haviya amakupi malegahae.

Hulategeta Anumaya Kotia Kalaisi agile huhaleno tahapaigeta agai avayafiti kea mage nehune “Musetami nehunagi Kalaisia tamakaifene huno fali-maineafe Anumaya Kotina tamakoya hute yana ataletama agaiene tamaipa alitama falu hutama nagopi maiho.” huta tamahapai-mainone.
Falimaineanagi falimainea yamoa atafa huno atakalo ohune. Anumaya Kotia anima agata yama alino falimainea yapitila kalu heno ali hetitene.
Yisasia, tamakaila agaialega lamatenea kanomona kanale agia anima moneamima hanea veamoya hu-haviya hu neatae.
Havili neno aneginagi nohisia kanoe. Vayala havigu mohae mehae nohisia kanoe. Ke vai yana alino falote ohuno aipa kanale yapi nemaisia kanoe. Monema alisia yafena hagaa nohaesia kanoe.

Omaleneanagi nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kema akave malesaya yateti Anumaya Kotife hamau amayamopafi tusiya huno hamau-maine. Yisasiene tokaena mainoe. hunoma nehea kanomoa Yisasima hu-mainea kava huno ute ete hisie. Aniama hisunana Yisasiene tokaeta mainone. huta havilama hugahune.

Falote higena nagaya neagogeno tagufa (3) Kefo Avamula utu kana avamula nagola osifavemo avayafiti vayi higeno nagola kefo afai afumo avayafiti vayi higeno nagola havigegeyama nehia aune kanomo avayafiti vayi humaine.

Anumaya Koti autamafina nagola kahegi kea mage huno haneane Kagaikaa kaugafahema kahaisia avamete negafu augafahena kahaino. huno hu-maineane. Tamakaya ani kahegi kema akave malayana kanale kava nehae.

Mainaageta lagaya tagaiti laugafa alita haisuna yafe mani kea huhaleta nohunagi Yisasina Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahe hutenea kanoa “Anumayati maine.” huta tamaya hisunafe Yisasi aliya vaya mainone.
Havigema nehaya veamogami kea ohaviho. Fatago veamoya kefo yama nehaya veanene maisayana ali haviya hulamategahagi kayetama maiho.

Anumaya Kotia taipa falu hisia yamona aepaa maineno alino hagelafi-latea kemoa tokiyaage huno hanege hanege hisia yafenagino Yisasima fali-mainea kolamoa ailaki-lavigeno Anumaya Kotia Yisasina fali-mainefiti alino hetitene. Ali hetitegeno sipi sipile kava kanoa tusia ala kava kanoti maine.

Falisuo maisuo Kalaisia hulatenea kanale mono kema tamahapai-mainoa kava hutama fatago kate vaiyeho. Mo lamakesuo afaa alule mainesuo tamakaifena mani kegeya havisue Nagoke amaku amakesale hetiya maineya Yisasia hulatenea yana haviya amakupi maleneya tokiyaage huya alu veamogamina huhaleya hamanepaiye. huya hisagenahena tusia muse hugahue.
Anumaya Kotia tokiyaaleti Yisasina fali-mainefitila alino hetiteneanagino tagayama falisunagenoa ania huno alino hetilategahie.
Naa hu-maineafe nagayama kagai kanute nayama malogeno Anumaya Koti aliyamona tokiya yamaa kamigeka ali-mainana tokiya yana fufu hisanageno kanale anefe tesigeka ani aliyana oataleka alige-lige huo.

Ani yafe Anumaya Kotina kanale mono kea agoma haviteya fali-mainaya veamogamite vigeno Anumaya Kotia ma veamogami kaiyekema hu-matesia kava huno fako hu-mategahie. Anumaya Kotia avamu mainea kava huya amaku amamena ofaligeya afaa mainae.
Anumaya Kotia ala miyateti miya hu-lamategetama agai veane mainagi ma mopafi veamogami aliya veanea omaisae huna nehue.
Nagoa veamoya “Anumayamoa havi kava nehie.” huya kalu kalu ke hutageno ensole kanomoa nagoa veala me hamaegeya fali-mainayane. Tamakaya Anumayamofena kalu kalu kea vaioateho.

Kasagoya veamoya Anumaya Koti aliyateti “Miya alisune.” huya nehagi tagaila Anumaya Kotia hulategeta fatago huta kelamagema huhaleta hunana Kalaisiene ailokaeta maineta Anumaya Koti aufina mani kea huhaleta nehune.

Yisasife tamametiti huta tokiya nevauna veamogata amametiti yaamimoma tokiya ovainea veamogami kana yaamia “Tamakaitami aliho.” huta ohisunagi tagaya hamamaeta alita tagaiti lagu tagesamoma haisia kavala ohisune.
Visigena nagaya visua yupa Anumayamoa kania vali-nategahie huna nametitia nehuna nagaienena aupaa tamakaitega ugahue huna nehue.

Ani kema havitena agoana foa (4) ensole vayamoya foa (4) ma mopamo atupalega heti-maineya yasimona atafa huya ali-talako huligeno yasimoa taga higeno mopafima hanea yamoene hagelimoene yosayagamoenena kanage kanagala ohunae.

Tamakaya nayona Yisasi kema ohavinaya veamoyama nehamaiya auava yana tusiya hutama hu-mainagi menia nagoene ania ohiho. Ani auava yamoya maa hu-mainae, Amaugafa haga neya kumai he kavaene alitalu huya ala kave neneya havili neya aneginagi huya hagifali kema nehatagaya yaene agoma fali-mainaya vayafe Anumayati mainae. huya amakisana nevaiya kavaene neataletama nagoene ohiho.

Nagoa veamoya ani kanolatana ali haviya hugahema hisagenoa ani kanolatamogani anavayafitila atamo aikalu huno kame veaania temasagalisigeya faligahae. E, anakaima ali haviya hunatesaya veamoya faligahae.

Hageno Poloa mage hie “Nafunaganagatama musetami nehugi nagaya havi kava hue. Agayama mono note hagote kava kano maine kema havimainoleasina mani kea ohuleasinagi. Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno kae-maleneane ‘Kava kanotamimofena kanale ohunesia kea ohiho.’ huya kae-malenagena age-mainoane.” huno nehie.

Hai falegahayanagi kefo yamaage veanene, hanageke kava nehaya veanene, kumai heya vaineayaya veanene, vea hamaeya falineamataya veanene, ago fali-mainaya veafe ‘Anumayati maine.’ huya amakisana nevaiya veanene havigehe muse huya akave nemalaya veanene ani kumamona malaga maigahayanagiya Anumayamo ala kumatela haiya omaigahae.

Oatalenagi nagoa kefo yana nehageno naipamoa haviyana nehie. Tamakai amunopina nagoa veamoya Palamuma humainea kea atafa huya akave nemalae. Nayona Palamua Isaleli veamoya asaga hu lavisae huno Palakina mage huno hapai-maine “Mage huka hamapaiyo ‘Amayateti talo humalenaya afa yafe ‘Anumayati maine.’ hutama amiya kavela nenetama kumai kavala hiho.’ huka amaipa ayesana kea hamapaiyo.” huno humaineane.

Tafu-tagana-gatama tamakaya Yisasifema havitama tamakupi malenaya yamoa mai lokiya vaitama maiya yaenefe tamakayama tusiya hutama mukiamogatama nagoke nagokemogatama tamahau tamayamopafima lamahaiya yamoa via yamo alakefa hia yaenefe Anumaya Kotitega ke huta muse ya neamune. Mukia yupa tatea kava huta tamakaifena Anumayamotega ke huta muse yana neamune.
Nayona Yisasi kema ohavinaya kanafina Satania tamavayu higetama agea oaino ago fali-mainaya veafena “Anumayati mainae.” hutama amakisana nevaitama havi kate umainaya yafena tamakaya ago havilinae.
Kalaisia anagaamogamife hau ayamopafi tusiya huno hau humateno hamamaesia yafe fali-maine. Ani kava hutama vemogatama anetamimo-gamina amaya hutama tamahau tamayamopafi anetamihena tamahaino.
Nagoa veamoya havi kavama hulamatesagetama anonaa havi kavala hu oamateho. Mukia veamogami amaufina kanale kavakeya hiho.

Ani yafe tamakaya Anumaya Kotima tokiyaaletima kavama yagaisiana agai ayapi maigahune. hutama nehutama tamaugafa alitama ohaitama ako hutama maisayana agaiama hu-malenea kanafina tamakaila alisaga lamahaugahie.

Kahegi oamateneanagi ‘Nagaya ma mainoe.’ huno amaveligahe huno kanale kavala humateno ikapinagatila kola lamamino hoyafina kanale kavela lamamino tamaku tamamemoa muse hisia yana male hiya hulamatene.” huana nehae.
Aneamimoyaenena ania huya kanale ya huya maineya alumo kea aliya atifi mafi ohisae. Havi lina neya aneginagi ohuya efi efi huya fatago aliyamaage aliya maisae.
Higena nagaya ani amofena “Kumai yakahena kagua aiyahae huka nagoene ohisana kagesa havio.” huna agava mauvanagi agua aiyahae nohie.

Helotia kava yagai-mainea mopafiti kaveamia nealiya yafe Helotia Taiya nemaiya veanene Saitoni veanenefe tusiya huno aipa haviya humategeya nago amaku amakesa haviteya alitalu huya Helotina hagote aliya kanoamote Palasatusite mage huya me hae “Falu huta maisuna yafe kagaya Helotina hapaiyo.” huya hageno agaya nago aipa ani veanene huteno Helotite emainae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaipina Kefo Avamula omaine. Aao nagaya Nenafa agi alisaga nehugetama lamakaya nagai nagia alitama afepinaga nemalae.
Ala yasigefamoa eno tina melino mo ai-yahae me ai-yahae huno tusiya hu-maine.

Nagaya nagesa havuana haenagama Anumaya Kotia tokiya hale yamaa fufu yate ali falote hinageno tavelisigeta agesuna yafe tagesa haviteta “Meni kanafima tagata aiya yama nealuna yana afa ya kana humaine.” huta hugahune.
Osi nafanenimogatama Yisasi agile Anumaya Kotia kefo yatamia ago aige-lamateno atale-lamatenea yafe mani avona negaove.

Anumaya Kotia kefo kava huna yapiti tagu tamena alino katigeta alu aotage anagaa maisuna yafe tagaila huno yogi-malene. Tagayama kanale humainona yafene huno huyo okinegi agaia agesa haviteno haiya kava huno kayone hulategahe ani kavala humaine. Ikaene mopaene falote ohunegeno Yisasi Kalaisia Kayone hulamategahue. huno agesaa havimaineanagino menia Yisasia efalotema humainea yateti taveli-maine. Tagayama kefo kavama huna yamo anonaa Yisasi Kalaisia alia yafe tagu tamena aligatiteno fali yamo tokiyaa ago ali hano hu-taleteno ofalita agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula tamiteno umaige maige hisuna kaana ago taveli-maine.

Hama-paigeya mono note kava vayamoyaene ati vayaene Yisasina ageteya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino. Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hae. Hageno Pailatia kenonaamia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaitami avaletama yafaga yosalela nilia hetama asaiho. Nagaya nago kefo yamaahena ati-yoana omaleanagina ohaegahue.” huno hie.
Ani tamaku tamame aligati-mainea yafena nayona Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya tusiya huya ati yegeteya Anumaya Kotia tamakaila kayone hisaya yana tamamisia yafena amaune laga huya hamapai-mainayane.

Nesuya veamoya aye lamavataga huya havige nehuya ma mopafina vaiyatete huya havigea mage huya nehae Yisasi Kalaisia ma mopafina vea eno omaine. huya nehae. Mani kema hisaya veamoya havigelafa aye lamavataga hisaya vaya maineya Yisasina kame vayaa mainae.
Tagayama agonana ma kanoa Poloe tusia havi kavayaga nehuno mukia kumate Yuta veamogami amunoamifina hetino ke vaino tu hisaya ke hamanepaino Nasaleti Yisasi kema nehaviya veamogami ala kanoami maine.

Anumaya Kotia hufalote huno tahanepaiya auava yana tusia lamayo aisuna yane. Yisasia ma mopafi vaya augafa kalino efalote huno mainegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa Lamage huno Anumaya maine. huno tahapai-maine. Ensole vayamoya agaila agageya vayamoya avagea huya alu kote kote mo huya falote hageno ma mopale kasagoya veamoya haviteya aliya amakupi maleya amametiti hageno Yisasia eteno ikapinaga nehaino tokiyaage hale yamona ali-maine.

Tusia komopa, yafa ku kana huteno, ala alaisi ku kana huno kanaage huno ikapinagati asaga hulavi hulavi hiaamo veamogami amaugafale taviaamo ali haviya humategeya Anumaya Kotifena “Otahaiya kano mainane.” huya kamugea hatageya vaitenae.

Naa hugahagi Anumaya Kotia ago hu lokiya vaino mage huno humaine Ani ikaene mopaene hanoma hisiana haegafa ikaene mopaene talo hisugeya fatago amaku amakesaene veaneage anilela maigahae. huno humaine. Ani yama falote hisiafe tagaya muse hisune.
Ikamoa iva yuguma alitama aye kafage kitama hayama negiya kava huno ikamoa fanane higeno mukia agoyaene ti amunopima hanea mopaene noamia ataleya nagoene omalenae.

Naa hu-maineafe Anumaya Kotina nehaiya yanagino, maa humaine Yisasi Kalaisia nagoke yupa kanoa agaia augafama hakino amiteno fali-mainea yateti tagaya ma mopafi veamogatina kefo yatia aye hami-talegeta tagaya agaila alu aotage veanea menia mainone.
Tagaya mukia yupa Anumaya Kotitega tamakaifena muse huta tamaki ayeta nunamuna nehune.

Higena agoana nagola kolamaage hosi afua agogeno nago kanomoa ani afumo agupifi mainegeno ala avenene naepe kayoene mukia ma mopafi veanene tuma hisia tokiyaaene amigeno aliteno ma mopafi veamoya tuma huya hamaesageya falisaya amakesa ago amamineanagino amaipa falu huya maisaya yamoa mukia ma mopafina ago hano humaine.

Yisasina amakuama aminaya veamoya, nofi humatageya afa aliyama nealiya veamoya, amatesia kava huya kava vayaamimo-gami amakia alisaga hisae. Alisaga nehuya keamia ali hipoya ohisageya veamoya neamakeya Anumaya Koti agia ali haviya nehuya Anumaya Kotiamimo kea akave nomalae. huya hugahae.
Tamakaya atafa kenama asagitama hagayu hutalaya avamete hutama atafa lamaipaene humainaya yaenena ago atalenagi nelamafu-gamifena havigema ayemavataga nehaya kea ataleho.

Nehayanagi nagoa kefo yama nehagenoa naipamoa haviya nehie. Nago amo agia Yesepelie mage huno humaine “Nagaya Anumayamo aune a mainoe.” huno havigea nagai aliya veamogamina ayemavataga huno mage nehie “Kumai yana nehutama amayateti talo humalenaya afa anumayamoma amiya kavela neho.” huno humaine.

Anumaya Kotia nayona mage huno agesa havimaine Haenagaa Isaleli vea omainesaya veanemoya nagaifena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayafe Fatago veane. huna humategahue. huno agesa haviteno kanale mono kea Apalahamuna hapai-maineanagino Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kae-maleneayane Kagaitetifene huna mukia ma mopale veanea Anumaya Kotina muse yana amamitena ali kanale humategahue. huno higeya kae-malenayane.

Anumaya Kotia tamavaleteno nafaneyagaahema humainea kemoa tamake-kanio? Mage huno hu-maineane Nafanenimoga Anumayamoa kaumonoma malesigekahena Afa yane. huka ohuo. Ke negama-kino kayoma kamisiana kagaila kavaleno ali fatago hugatesia yafe nehigi kaipamoa haviyana ohino.

Kava vayamogami kea havitama ali hipoya nehutama amakai amaiyaafi maiho. Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamete kava hisaya yafe ali hetimateno aliyana amamineanagi haenagaa tamakaifena hamavi-gegahie. Hamavi-gesigeya tamakaila muse hisaya kema hisagetama tamakaienena muse hugahayanagi amaipamoa kanalema ohisiana tamaya ohugahie.
Anumaya Kotia sevenia (7) nofi veamoya Kenani nemaiya veamogamina hamae hano higeya faligeno amakai mopa Isaleli veamoya maisaya yafene huno alino amamine.

Nagoa veamoya alu ke hisayana Anumayatia Yisasi Kalaisina kelamage keamona akave ohuya Anumaya Kotina haiya kava hiho. huya nohaya veala amakaiami amaugafa aliya nehaiya kanale amaku amakesa amakai amakupina tamage huno omalene. Omalenea yafe kema hisaya yafena ati neayeya Yisasi kehe ke vaiya nemaiye. Kema vaiya yapiti nago yana falote nehigeya mage huya nehae Agima haneafe ali haviya hugahe nehune. huya amakaiami keamimo tua hu neamategeya amakia hu haviya nehuya Havi kavala nehae. huya humatenayane.
Nago kanomoma tamakaitema evayi hunoma mani Yisasi kema oalino alu ke alu kema alino esigetama tamakaya hu falu fala hu oatetama avaletama notamifina oateho.
Yisasi Kalaisitema kasagoya kana yama falote humainea avamete huno tagaipina kana yana falote nehiafe Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainonanagino agaya tusiya huno taipamona alino kanale hunelate.

Avonio amaugafama alino haviya humatesia yafena kayeya maisae. Kenia havi kavama huno aganaamona Epolona haegeno fali-mainea kava huya tamakaienema nemaiya vayamoya ani kava maiya nehuya hilato ohunea katela nevae. Nevagi nago kanomo agia Palamue mone alisia yafe havigea maino nehianagiya ani vayamoya ani augafa kava huya mone alisaya yafe havigegeyana maiya nehae. Nehageno nago kanomo agia Kolae Anumayamona veganokano hutegeno Anumayamoa fali hano hutenea yafena nohaviyanagiya ani vayamoya ani kavakeya maiya nehuya Anumaya Koti kemona amakavenona hu neatayafe Anumayamoa Faliho. huno hinageya fali hano hugahae.

Naa hu-maineanagi Yisasi kehena havigegeyama nehaya vayamoya ani kavala nohagi amakesamoa havilama ohunea yamofena hu-haviya hu neamatae. Afu kalamoya amaku amakesa nohaviya avamete kava nehageno ani kavama haya yamo amaugafamona ali haviya hu-matene.

Anumaya Kotia Noana haenagama falote hisia yana, Noaa oagenea yafema hapaigenoa Tamage nehane. huno amayo aiteno havino agupi maleno ametiti huteno agaia afamo kanoa hamaoke hesiafene huno Anumaya Koti kea akave maleno tipi kalea talo humaine. Naa hu-maineafe Anumaya Kotifema havino ametitima hia yana Anumaya Kotia ageteno Fatago kano mainane. huno huteneane. Huteneanagino mukia ma mopafi mainaya veamoya Anumayamofema haviya amakupi omalaya auavaamia Noaa ali fufute maletegeno Anumayamoa ani veamogamifena Kefo ya humainae. huno anonaamia amamigeya fali-maine.
Ani yayaga talo tala hu-maleteya mono note kava vayamoya mukia kanafina kumategati hai nefaleya nemaiya nopi haiya aliyaamia alimainae.
Tamakaya kea ohavi veane mainetama tamaku tamakesafinaga “Anumaya Koti kea ohavigahune.” hutama Alu Aotage Avamumona tamakaveno hutetetama tamakinagomoya nehaya kavaage nehae.

Kanale yama huya fatagoma humainaya veanehe mani kahegi kemoa ohunegi kefo kavama maiya nehuyama mainaya veanene, ke ohavi veanene, veganokano veanene, Anumaya Koti kema akave nomalaya veanene, kefo kavaagema maiya nehaya veanene, Anumaya Kotina amakaveno huteya hu haviya hu neataya veanene, nefanagi itaamonagi huno hamaeno nefalino, alu veanene hamaeno nefalia vayaenefe mani kea humaine.
Nagoma kae-malenoa avopina mage huna humainoe “Kumai nehesaya veanenena tokaetama omaiho.” huna kae-malenoe.
Akave malenoanagi itanimoa onatenegeno Anumaya Kotia aliyamaa alisuafene huno agaia kayone yamaaleti nagaila ago hapali-nateneane.
Nagayama nehua yamo aepaa ohavinoe. “Nenahaiya yama hisue.” huna hua yana nohuanagi “Onahaiya yane.” huna hua yamaage mukia kanafina maina nehue.

Tamakai tamagu tamamema aligati-mainea kanoa, Yisasi Kalaisifena, ago havimainagi agaia kayone yamaafi mainetama nagoene kayonema hisaya yana alitetama Kalaisife tamakesa havi havi hutama havilama hutetama ko hiho. Anumaya Kotina alu aotage tokiya hale yamaamoa meniene haenagaaene agola akaiafikeya mukia kanafina hanege hanege huno hanesigeta tagaya mukia kanafina agai agia alisaga huge huge huta maisune. Tamage. Kenia male hano hie. Nagaini nagia Pitanae.

Tagaya Yisasi Kalaisi aliya nealunanagita aifo vaya kana huta mainonagi tamakaya Kalaisiene ailokaetama mainetama kanale havi haviyatami hanea veane mainao? Tagaya tokiyatia omale vaya maunagetama tamakaya tokiyatami hanea veane mainao? Tamakai tamakia alisaga nehayanagi tagaifena “Otahaiya vaya mainae.” huya nehae.

Vai neayeanagi tamakaya Yisasife havitama lamakupi maletama tamametiti nehutama tokiya vaitama Satanife Kagai kea ohavigahunagi alulega vuo. hutama hapaiho. Tamakaya ago havimainae mukia kotega tamafu-tamakanaya tamakaiene ania huya amakata yapi nemaiye.

Nofipi mainetama miya oali aliya veamogatama mopale mainaya kava vayatamimogami kea mukia havitama akave maleho. Havigu “Nagaifena ‘Kanale kano maine.’ huno hisie.” hutama kava kanomo aulekeya aliyana nealitama havigu alulegama visaya kanafina oalisagi aao Anumayamofena koli nehutama tamakuamoa fatago hinagetama mukia kanafina aliyatekeya maiho.
Agana tenia (10) avemoa tenia (10) Sauve vaya maineya menia yaufa kava aliyana oalinayanagiya kefo afai afuene tokiyaami aliteya ani kava aliyana aupa kana kanoafi kava yagaiteya atalegahae.
Anumaya Kotia ma mopafi veamoya nehaviya amaku amakesa notamigi tagaima Anumaya Kotia taminea kema havilama huta havisunafe ani Alu Aotage Avamula tamigeta avale-mainone.
Tusia monetamima hanea veamogatama haviho. Tamakaitela hanageke yama vayi hugahema hisia yafena tamakaya kalagi aitama aviteho.

Tamakata aisia yana aligahayanagi kolia ohiho. Haviho Satania aye lamavataga hisigeya nagoa veamogatamina nofila hulamategahae. Tenia (10) kanafi ani kana yaene tamakata aisia yaenena aligahayanagi havitama lamakupi malenaya yana atafa hu-linetama falisagena ani yateti kanale miyana anonatamia maige maige hisaya tamahaimula tamamigahue.

Kagaya Timotigae Anumaya Koti kema akave nemalana kanomoga mukia ani kefo yana neataleka fatago kavaage hisana kagesa havika maineka Anumayamoma nehaiya kavaage nehuka Yisasife havika kagupi malenana yana atafa hulineka veafena kahau kayamopafi kahaino. Tokiya vaisana yana atafa nehuka mailava huka ako huka maiyo.

Tamakaya ma mopafima mainaya kanafina kanaleya hutama tamahaiya yamaagela alitetama musena maitama nehagi Anumaya Kotia kaiyeke hu-lamatesia kanafina tamakaila tamaku tamamena tamahae falisiafenagitama kavela nenetama tusinasi vayala ko nehae.

Neagogeno tueti foa (24) sia ani sauve kanomo siale maigagi-mainageya tueti foa (24) kava vayamoya ani siayagale mainae. Maineya efeage kenaamia fai-lineya amanutela sauve veamoya kanileta yafateti talo humale tumano kuma vai nealiya avamete huya vai-linae.

Ani kumai amoa agaia augafa alino nehaino ageno hayema hia kavama hu-mainea yatetila kagaya ania huka augafa agata aisia yaene tusia aviteno augafahema kalagi aisia yaene amio. Ani amoa agupinaga mage huno nehavie ‘Nagaya ala Sauve anemo siale mainoanagina megusa akefa omainoanagino nagaitela kana yamoa falote hisigena nagaya avia oategahue.’ huno agesa havimaine.

Avemoga ania huka akamoene ako huka tokaeka maiyo. Amo augafamoa falu falu hu-maineafe agi alisaga nehuka tamakaya ako hutama amaya hiho. Anumaya Kotia kayone huno maige maige hisaa tanahaimula ago tanaminea yafe tokaetana kanaleya hutana mainetana Anumayamotega nunamuna hutana havigesaana nago yamoa katania maleli otegahie.
Vemoya anemogamina kavaami mainayanagiya anemoya Anumayamo kea huge amavelige hiho huna nohugi ako huya maineya ke haviya maisae huna nehue.
Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoa Yisasi Kalaisie Alatimoene nagoke tamaipale maisayafe tamakaila ke huno “Naa hugahue.” huno hulamatenea kea oatalegahianagino ani kavala hugahie.

Nafunagana-gatama Mosese kahegi kefiti nofila humainageno Anumayamoa alino kalu he-lamateteno ago ke higetama agaialega emainagi tamakaya atafa lamaku tamakesamo nehaisia kavala hutama omaiho. Omaigahagi nelamafu-gamifena tamahau tamayamopafi nelama-haisigetama amaya hisaya kavakeya hiho.
Kefo yamoma nofi kilatenea yana ago alino kalu helatenea kemoa kaiyekea hulateno fako hugahie. Ani yafe mukia kanafina kema hisaya yaene maisaya auava yaene ani kemoene nagopi maiho.
Anumayamo aliyana alua lua aliya hanegeta nealunanagi nagoke Anumaya maine.

Ani nofipiti tokiyaage taginagomoya falote humainayanagino Kalaisia Anumaya Kotima tamaugafa aligatigahie huno hutenea kanoa ani taginagomoyafiti velafa maisiafe falote humaine. Kalaisia mukia yana kava yagaino Anumaya Koti maineanagita mukia kanafina agola agia alisaga hisune. Tamage.

Tagaitema kana yama falote hisigeta tamakaifena, tagaya tamaipa ali kanale hulamatesuna yafe falote nehie. Tamakaila tamaku tamamema aligatisiafe falote nehie. Falotema hia kanafina Anumaya Kotia taipamona alino kanale hulatesigeta tagaya tamaya hisunafe taipa alino kanale hunelate. Tagaitema falote humainea avamete kana yana tamakaya aligeno Anumaya Kotia tamaya hinageno tamaipamoa kanale hisigetama mailava hutama mai lokiya vaitama maigahae.
Agia alisaga nehunageno Anumaya Kotia agaia tavaleno tagaiene tamakaiene Kalaisiene aigamaelateno “Tokiya vaitama maiho.” huno hunelate. Ani kema huhaleta hisunafe tagaila hapalilatene.

Higeno nagoene agea aino mage huno humaine “Anumaya Kotia ago alino sese humalenea yafena ‘Oniyaagela ohunegi afaa alika no.’ huno humainea kavefena nagoene ‘Oniyaage humaineanagina onegahue.’ huka ohuo.”
Mukia Sauve vayamoya ani kumai akefaenena kumaima heya mukia kefo yaenema humainaya Sauve vayamoyama ani kumatema kae-malesageno ata halinamoma ageteya tusiya huya hamauna huteya avia ategahae.

Havigegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagoa veamoyama nagaifema hamau amayamopafima hamaisigeyahena nagai kemona akave malesagenofena Nenafaa amakaifena ania huno hau ayamopafina haugahie. Nenafaene nagainienena amakaiene emaigahue.

Manima hau ayamopafima hau-mainea yana tagaya Anumaya Kotife tahau tayamopafi nelahaiya yanomagi agaia tagaifema hau ayamopafima hau-mainegeno agaia nafanea hutegeno emaine. Tagayama kefo yama huna yafena Anumaya Kotia havino aipa haviya hu-lateneanagi Yisasia kefo yatihe huno faligeno Anumaya Kotia aigetateno kefo yatia alitalesia yafe Yisasina hutegeno emaine.

Nomalonanagi Anumaya Kotima hale yapima mainea ya huta hale yapima ute etema hisunana nelafuyaene nagoke taipale maisunagenoa Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoa, Yisasi kolamoa mukia kefo yatia aye hami nelate.
Humaineafe kagaya nofipina nagoene omaigane. Aao. Menia Anumaya Kotia kavaleno agaia nafane kategeka mainane. Anumaya Koti nafane mainanafe Kamigahue. huno hulokiya vaimalenea yana aligane.
Hu-maineanagi nafaneamofena mage hu-maine Anumaya Kotiga kagaya mukia kanafina agola kava yagaika maige maige huka maigane. Kagaikaa kavama yagaisanana fatago auavateti yagaigane.

Hama-vi-gegeya “Tokiya avame yama hu-mainana yafene huta yafatetila okahaegahunagi kagaya ma mopafi afa kano mainekagi ‘Anumaya Kotiene nagoke mainoe.’ hukama hanana Anumaya Kotina kalana ategana kema hana yateti kagaila yafa kayotetila kahaegahena nehune.” huya hae.

Mukia kanafina ani amakatama aige aige hisia atamo halinamoa taga ohugahianagino agola haige haige huno haigahie. Haigeya ani veamoya kefo afai afuleene amayateti avame-name huya talo hu-malenaya amemaaene agia alisaga nehuyama ani kanomo agima amaugafale hanesia veamoya mukia kanafina agola kegeene felugaene amaugafa amakata aige aige hinageya hano ohugahie.” huno humaine.
Anumaya Kotia kalagi ailateno “Nagai kea huhaletama hiho.” huno hulateneafe “Kasalotahae.” huta nohune.
Hu-maineanagita tole lagesa ohavisunagi tokiyaage huta maineta mage hisune Kolia ohugahugi Anumayamoa kanaleya huno naya nehigeya veamoya ali haviya hu onategahae. huta hugahune.

Mukia kavema nesia kafu-kaganaa afuma nonesia afu-agananafena “Afa kano mainane.” huno huoateno. Afumo ameama nonesia afu-aganaa mukia kavema nesia afu-aganafena “Naa kano mainane.” huno huoateno. Anumaya Kotia ani tole kanolatana ago anavale-maine.

Anumaya Kotia veala tokiya vaisaya yaene amaku amakesa ali hetimatesia yaene aepaagino tamaya hisigetama Yisasi Kalaisi humainea auava yana akave maletafa hutama nagoke tamaku tamakesale maisae huna Anumayamotega havinegoe.

Nayona mono notela hagote kava vayamoya mukia kanafina sipi sipi heya kae-salamana huya Anumaya Kotina neamiyane. Neamiya hagoteya amakaiami kefo yaamima ali-talesiafene huya Anumaya Kotina amiteya anile mukia veamogami kefo yaamima ali-taleseafene huya haenaga aminayane. Aminayanagi Yisasia agaia kefo yamaa omaleanagi nagoke yupa kanoa veamogami kefo yafene huno yafaga yosale fali-mainea yupa agaia augafa hakino Anumaya Kotina amiteno kae-salamana huteneane.

Faligahunanagi nagoa veamoyama ma mopalema kanaleya huya maisaya yana hanegeya nagoa yafema kafu huya nemaiya anagaamima amaketeya Tamahaote yatamie. huya nagola nesaya yana oamamisagenoa Anumaya Kotina hau ayamopafima nehaiya yana ani veamogamipina tamage huno omalene.

Nahau-mainea nafunagana-gatama menia ali lamakafa huna tamahanepauve tamakaya ma mopalela aupa kana kanoama maisayafene tamaugafahema age lamahayema nehaya yana ataleho. Anima age lamahaye hisaya yamoa tamaku tamakesaene ke vaiana tu nehae.
Mukia veamogamina tamaipa amamiho. Tamafu-tamakana-gamina kayone humamiho. Anumaya Kotife kolia hiho. Ala sauve kanomo agi alisaga hiho.
Faligeno Mosesea ma agesa havimaine “Vayanimoya mage huya hugahae ‘Anumaya Kotia Mosese ayapiti taugafa aligatigahie.’ huya hugahae.” huno agesa havianagi vayaamoya ani amakesa ohavinae.
Kefo aliyama nealiya vayamoya afai kala kana huya Tamaugafa hataga hiho. huya nehaya vayafena kayetama maiho.

Ani veamoya amavayaleti mage nehae Anumaya Kotina agelama hu-mainone. huya nehayanagi nemaiya auava kavaamimoa ani kehena Havige nehae. huno tahapai-maine. Anumaya Koti kea aliya neatagayageno kanale auava kava hisaya tokiyaamia omalegeno Anumaya Kotia amakaifena tusiyate nohaiye.
Amakayama nehaya kavala agetena mani kea nehue amakaya Anumaya Kotina haisia kavala aluya huya hisaya amaku amakesa nehaviyanagi anima haiya yafena havilama nohuya ani kavala nohae.

Tagaya mukia kana yama alunagenoa Anumaya Kotia taipa kanale hulatesia yana nelamie. Tamineafe tagaya ania huta nagoa veama kana yama falote humatesigeta Anumaya Kotia tayama hia kava huta veala amaipa alita kanale humatesunafe tagaitema falote humainea avamete kana yana falote humaine.
Anumaya Koti aufima hetisana yupa kagai aliyafena muse hugatesia yafena Anumayamona kanale kelamage kemona aepaa havi fatago huka kaya mukiki huka hu falote nehuka kagayea ohino.

Mukia yamona vayamoya agima alisaga nehuya Anumayati maine. huyama hisaya yafena ani Kefo Kanomoa Afa ya kana yane. huno kame humateteno ala mono nopi haino siale maineno Nagaya nagainia Anumaya Kotina mainoe. huno hugahie.
Tamakaya neamafagatama nafanetamimoya amaipa ali haviya huya hamai vaisaya kea huoamatetama Anumayamo aufima haisia kava hutama agai kea humavelitama yagai mateho.
Mukia mani havi yayagahema “Aoteyamaae.” huta hisune. Kalaisia tagaifema hau ayamopafi haumainea kanomo tokiyaleti mukia ani yayaga amakaseta mainone.

Higeta lagaya mopafi asaga hu-lavita tagoya aye-maineta havugeno Yuta vayamogami kefiti mage hie “Sologae Sologae naa higeka nagaila ali haviya nehane? Aniama hanana avela hanegeno kagaikaa kagata neaiye.” huno humaine.

Tamakaya kana yapi mainetama mukia yatamia omale veane mainayanagi Anumaya Kotia kanale yana ago tamamigena nagaya ago age-mainoe. Nagoa veamoya “Tagaya Yuta veane mainone.” huya nehayanagi Yuta veanea omainagi Satani anaga maineya huhaviya hu-lamataya yana nagaya ago age-mainoe.
Veafe hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya veamoya nago kanomoa kefo yama hisia yafena muse ohugahagi tamage kelefe musena hugahae.
Ani yafe mukia kefo yana tamakaveno hutetama tamaugafa alitama ohaitama Anumaya Kotia kema tamakupima fai-malenea kea havilama hutama haviho. Ani kemoa tamaku tamamena aligatisia ke hane.
Nagaya Yisasi kea tamakupina fai-maletogeno Apolosia timaa hefino taki-maleneanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiage alino aifalo higeno hagemaine.

Hume hume nevigeno akavelega nago ensole kanomoa neeno mage huno humaine “Ala kumala Papiloni kumala tusiya huya ago aliya tagape aitalae. Papiloni veamoya mukia kotega veafena mage huya humainae ‘Tagayama huna kava hutama kumai yana hagaage huno havili kana humainegi afaa neho.’ huya hageya ani kumai yana maiya humainae.”
Nagayama nehua kema akave malenutamahena nagaini nenafugatama maigahae.
Mainegi osi nafaneyaganimogatama kava yagaitama afaa Anumayamofena tamakesa havitama tamakua oamiho. Kaiyekenia male me hano hie. Nagainia nagia Yoninae.

Na kavama nehaya vayapitila nagoa vayamoya alu veamogami nopi haisageyahena ani nopi anemogamina kanale amakesa omaleno afaa havigu amakesale maineya kefo kava nehuya amatafama hayana kanaage nehamauno higeya maiyana alu kefo yaenefena amakesa nehaviya anene ke hageya aupaa amakaya Tamage nehae. huya ani keamia ali hipoya hageya ani vemoya ani anemo-gamina amatafa huya amaku amakesa ali haviya nehae.

Ani havigeage kemotela tamakesa kumoa ohutama tafu-tagana-gamina tagua neamamita tamage keage nehuta ko huta Kalaisiene aigamaeta agai kana veane maisunageno agaya tagaila tagenopa maineno kava hu-latesigeta tagaya mukiamogata agai augafa mainone. Tanuteti tokiya aliteta taganunamoa latafa hulinea kava huno mukia taiya taya taulagamo hia augafa kava huta veamogamina amaya huge huge nehuta nagopi aigamaeta maisunageno taugafamoa tusiya huno tokiyaage hisigeta tahau tayamopafima nelahaiya yateti tokiyaage huta maigahune.
Alu Aotake Avamumoa nagoke tamakuale falu hutama maisaya tokiya ago tamamineanagitama mani kavama atafa hu-linesaya yana atafa hu lokiya vaiho.

Higeno Soloa mage hie “Alamogae kagaya lagae?” huno higeno mage hie “Nagaya Yisasinae kagayama nagaima ali haviya hunenatana kanomonagi hetika ala kumate ugenoo. Nago kanomoa ‘Naa maa hugane.’ huno kahapaigahie.” huno hapai-maine.
Kolia ohugahagi Kalaisifena Agaiage taguafina Alatimo maine. hutama nehutama Yisasia eteno esia kanahema tamametiti hu-mainaya yafema tamahavi-gesagetamahena hamapaisaya kea talo tala hutama maiho.
Koli nehigeno Anumayamoa mage huno hie “Mamona alu aotage mopa nagainia mopagika kaiya anona asagika maletekao.
Tamakayama nayoma havimalenaya kea atafa hutakalo higeno kutamifi haneno. Ani kavama hisayana Nelafaene nafaneamoene tokaetama agola maigahae.
Tamage-lafa huna lamaha-pauve nagai kema akavema malesamoya ofaligahae.” huno hie.

Anile nagaya Yonina himonafi kana yapi agoana ala efeage ala Sauve kanomo sia hanegeno ani siale mainea kanoa age-mainoe. Agogeno mopamoene ikamoenena agai aulela faleana fanane huana nagoene omaletafa humainae.

“Anumaya Kotia kave nesunafene huno taipa talo huno nesuna kavela talo humaleneanagita afaa negahune.” huya nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia haenagaa kaveene taipaene alino fanane hugahie. Moli huliteta huta kumai hesunafene huno Anumaya Kotia veamogati laugafa talo ohunegi Anumayamoene ailokaeta mainesunageno ani laugafa agaia kava yagaisiafene huno talo hulatenea yafe moli huliteta huta kumai he kavala ohisune.

Naa humaineafe tamakaienena ani lamakesa havi havi hutama maiho, “Kalaisi falimainea avamete nagaya ago fali-mainoanagino kefo yamo tokiyamoa nagoene kava huonategahie. Yisasi Kalaisiene aigamaena Anumaya Kotina haisia kava hisue.” hutama hiho.

Kalaisia Satani ayapitila tavalegeta agaiene ailokaeta mainonanagita mukia kefo yana agaseta mainona yafe Anumaya Kotife muse huta agia alisaga hisune. Agaya tagaila laya higeta alule alule vaiyeta Yisasi kema nehuna yafena ani kemona havilama hageno kanale manaage yamo hia kava huno ute ete nehie.
Nagi Yisasima tahapai-mainea kea havitena tamahanepaugi haviho. Anumaya Kotia hale yamaaene kano mainegeno aguafina osi kanoa haniki mai yamaa tamagelafa huno omalene.
Mukia Nenafama naminea veamoya nagaitega egahae. Nago kanomoma nagaitegama esigenahena ‘Eteka vuo.’ huna hu oategahue.
Yisasi kema haviya amakupi malenaya nelama-fugamina tamaipa amamiho.

Maineno Anumaya Koti avatema neaya veanema hamamaesia yafena mukia kanafina Anumaya Kotitega ke huno havinegeafe mukiamoya agai agilema Anumaya Koti avatema neaya veamogamina amaku amamena ali negatie.

Higeya amakaya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Aoteyamaae. Aoteyamaae. Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hageno Pailatia mage huno hama-paiye “Nagaya tamakai sauve kanotamia yafaga yosale nili hena asaisue hugetama nehao?” huno higeya mono note kava vayamoya mage hae “Tagaila nago ala sauve kanotia omaine. Sisaa agaiage nagoke maine.” huya hae.
Anima humainea kate meni kanaene Anumaya Kotia agaia kayone yamaaleti osi anagaa agaia veane maisayafe ago hapali-malene.

Mukia ma mopafima mainaya Sauve vayamoya ani kumate mainaya veanenena tusiya huya kumaiya heya vai neayageya ma mopafima mainaya veamoyaenena ani kumate veanenena kefo yama nehaya kava huya havilima neya anegi-nagima nehaya kava humainae.” huno higena havi-mainoe.
Tamafu-tamakanafema aluya huno tamahaisigetama tamakua amamiho. Nagoke nagokemogatama tamafu-tamakanagami amakia alisaga hutama “Hagoteho.” hutama humateho.
Anumaya Koti Avamumo kema akave maleya vaiyayana Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga mainae.

Nehigeno nagola tokiyaage avame yana ikapinaga falote hie. Nagola tusia haesa osifave mainegeno sevenia (7) anuna hanegeno tenia (10) aveyaga anuyagafina hanegeno sevenia (7) ala sauve kanomo tumano kuyaga ani avetela vai-line.
Tahapaigeta tagaya Anumaya Koti nafanema mainonana Nelafa yana Kalaisiene tagai yatafa hapaegahie. He Kalaisiene kana yama alisunana ania huta agaiene tokiya haleyamaaene ala agiene aligahune.

Yisasina amakua aminaya vayate kava vayamoya kanale aliya nealiya Anumaya Koti ke huhaleya nehuya kanale keage hamapaisaya vayala Kanaleya huya amatesia kava nehae. hutama ani kavama haya anonaa amakia alisaga nehutama kanaleya hutama nagoene monea amamisae huna nehue.

Nagoa veamoya mani kea ohavineya “Afa anumayayaga tamage huya mainae.” huya nehae. Nagoa veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi malayanagi amakuamoa tokiyaagela ohuneafe ani afa anumayamoma aminaya afua neneya mage nehae “Afa anumayamo kave nenonageno ani kavemoa taguamona alino haviya higeno oniyaage nehie.” huya amakesa havimainae.
Agaya mukia nagai vaini nofi akopamoa alagama oayea akopayaga atagi neataleno alagama ayea akopayaga ‘Nagoene alaga ayesie.’ huno aia alino hagalo nehie.
Nealitama tamakaya ala vaya kana hutama mainetama tamayapima mainesaya veafena kahegi omatetama amatalegeya aiyaka maeme maeme visayafe kanale auava yana alitama maiho.

Nafunagana-gatama fali-mainaya veama haenagama hisaya kavafe ohavisaya yafena onahaiyanagina tamahapaigahue. Yisasi kema nohaviya veamoya tusiya huya avia neataya kavala tamakaya ohutama tamahaumana ohaleno alava hino.

Isaleli veamoya Isipi mopaleti ataleya Haesa titema ayana haviya amametiti hu-mainaya yafe Anumaya Kotia higeno ani limoa aluga luga heti-mainegeya hau hu-mainea mopa kana higeya ani lina afaa takaeya vayanagi Isipi vayamoya amanatiya Ani lina takaesune. huya hayanagi aluga lugama heti-mainea timoa eteno meli-nakaigeya fali hano humainae.
Higeno ani kanafina Mosesena itaamoa atetegeno Anumaya Kotia hau-mainea nafanegino itaamogani nefagania talia (3) ikana noanifinaga kava huana ataageno mainae.
Ani kanomoa kefo yama hisia tokiyaa omale kano maineno kema ohaviya veanene Anumaya Koti katema neatalaya veanenefena kea oamama-kino ako huno kea hamanepaiyane.

Hanima kimainea kanamoa ago hano hugahe nehigeno koma alino halesia kanamoa ago falote hugahe nehiafe mukia hani yapima nemaiya auava yana ataleteta tuma hisuna kenatia, hale yamo auava kenatia failisune.

Tamakaya aliyate kava vayaamimogatama ania hutama Anumayamofe tamakesa nehavitama kanale auava kava humateho. Mukia kanafina kea oamamakitama tamakai kava kanomoene amakai kava kanomoene nagoke kanogino ikapinaga maineafe tamakaya ago havimainae. Agaya mukia veala nagoke avamete huno kava yagai nelamate.
Nagoa veamoya kigi yokalo huya maisagetama tamakaienena ania hutama maiho. Nagoa veamoya avima atesagetama tamakaienena ania hutama avia ateho.

Kaguamoa tusiya huno tokiyaage humainegeka “Kefo yaniahena nagua aiyahae ohugahue.” hukama nehana yafena Anumaya Kotia kagaila haima vai negatea yana halaya humaleneanagino kaiyekema humatesia yupa agaia fatago huno fako hulamateteno tamaveligahie.

Nagoa Yuta vayamoya Atiokutiene Aikoniamutiene anile evayi huya alitalu humainaya vayamogami amaipamona huya ali hetimatageya yafa kayoteti Polona haeteya agayana higeya “Ago fali-maine.” huya amakesa haviteya kumamona malaga avayu huya mo talenae.

Yisasia mani kea hama-paitegeno aipamoa kanaage higeno agu agesama havia agesamoa hivi huno talavate oategeno mani kea hu-falote nehie “Lamage huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaipitila nago kanomoga vayamo havisigi huka nagesi huka kame ya hu-na-tegane.” huno hie.

Omaleneanagino Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno haneane mukia ma mopafi veamoya kefo kava maiya hageno amatafa huno nofila humatenegeno Yisasi Kalaisife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana Aligahae. huno hulokiya vaimalenea kema alisagenoa nofima humainaya nofila alikalu hetalegahie.
Hamaegaanagi Anumaya Kotima anaminea kea hu hano hutesaageno kefo afai afumoa ayola omaleno afepinaga tavi-mainea komufinagati ehaino me hanaesigeana faligae.
Tagaya Yisasife havita lagupi malenonanagi menia ania huta lagupi malenona yana atafa huta lokiyaage hulineta ani yaenema mo falinuta Kalaisiene ailokaeta maigahune.
Kefo yama humainayafe tamaugafamoa ago falimainegi Kalaisia tamakupi mainenageno Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulamateneafe tamaku tamamemoa agola maige maige huno maine.

Tamakinagomoya mukia Anumaya Kotina amaune vayaamogamina ali haviya humatenae. “Kanale Fatago Kanoa egahie.” huya amaune vayamogamina tamakinagomoya ago hamayageya falimainayanagi tamakaya ani Kanale Fatago Kanomona ago agesi hutama hayageno fali-maine.

Alu kanomo hia kavafe ageya hamaye nehaya yane. Havili neya aneginagi huya hagi fali ke hatage yane. Tagaiti atafa lagu tagesamoa mani kavayaga alino nagoa yayagaene alifalote nehie. Nayona ago tamahapai-mainoanagi menia nagoene tamahanepauve ani kavama maiya nehaya veanea Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea yapina tamage huya omaigahae.

Hale yamaama hanea kanafina hale yamaaene kanohe ‘Tamage nehane.’ hutama havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hiho. Aniama hisayana hale yamo nafaneyaga maigahae.” huno hama-pai-maine. Yisasia mani kea huteno neamataleno mo fala-ki-maine.

Anumaya Kotia Yisasina ani aliyate ateneanagino Anumaya Kotima humainea kea akave maleme maleme haimaine. Mosesea nayona ania huno Anumaya Koti anagapi maineno Anumaya Koti humainea kea akave maleme maleme hai-maineane.
Mainonageno lagu tamema aligati-mainea Yisasi Kalaisia fali-mainea yateti Anumaya Kotia Alu Aotage Avamula ago ali helafino lamine.

Nago kanoa Yosefee, nago agia Aposolo vayamoya mage huya malenae Panapasie huya malenae. Ani agimoa tagai kefina mage hie “Amaipa falu hisia ke nehia kanoe.” Ani kanomoa Livai nofi kano maine. Saipalusi kumateti kanomoa agaia mopa alu kano amigeno monea eteno amigeno ani monea alino Aposolo vaya me neamamiane.
Naama hisiafe nagoa kefo kavala ohuta kanale kavakeya kasalola otahaesigeta oataleta nago kanama vayi hisigeta kanaleya huta ali nena hisunageno ala hinageta anonaa aligahune.

Mosese kahegi kema ali hipoya hume hume nehauva yafena Fatago kanoe. huno hu onateleasine huna nehavugi fali-mainea kanomo augafa kava huna mani kehena nametitia nohue. Ani kahegi kemoa nahaegena falitogeno Anumaya Kotina haisia kava hisuafene huna kahema ki-malenea kehena nametitia nohue. Yisasia nagai kefo yamo anonaa aligahe higeya yafaga yosale heya asaigeno nagaifene huno fali-maineanagina nagaienena yafaga yosale nagaya asaina agaiene ago fali-mainoe.

Nago kanomoa malena agege gege hisua ayopa kana kayona namiteno mage hie “Kagaya hetika Anumaya Koti mono noene kae salamana nehaya folamoleene mo maleka agege gege huka hapalika ago. Ani nopina Anumaya Koti agima alisaga nehaya veala hapalika ago.

Ani veamoya anea amavayu huya ofaeyageno amakuamoa oniyaagela ohigeno Sipi sipi nafanemoa vai neyageya ani veaamoya akavela vai neayaye. Anumaya Koti Sipi sipi nafanemoa faliteno kefo yaamimo aigagimatenea yapiti miya humateteno ma mopafi veamogami amunopiti hagoteno amaugafa aligati-mainegeno Anumaya Kotiteene Sipi sipi nafanemoteene amavaleno amate-maineane.
Ani kenumoya tuma hugahema nehaya hosi afumo avamete huya amanutela kanileta yafateti talo humale tumano kula vai-linageno amaugosamoa veamogami amaugosa kali-maine.

Nayona kefo yama hu-mainaya yateti nofipina mainayanagi menia ago kalu he-lamatene. Nofipiti kalu he-lamatenaya kava hutama vaiyatete hugahagi Nofipiti kalu henateneanagina nagainia nahaiya kefo kavala hugahue. hutama ohutama Anumaya Koti aliya veanea mainone. hutama fatago veane maiho.

Haimuaene mainea Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogata kefo kavaage nehuna yapiti alino kalu hetaleno tagu tamena aligatigahe nehigi agaifema haviya amakuafi maleya amametitima nehaya veamogamina amaku amamena ago aligati-maine. Ani yafekeya tametitia nehuta taya mukiki huta aliyana nealune.

Fali-mainagi tamakaya na tamakesa nehaviye? Anumaya Koti nafanemofema amakaveno huteteya ali haviyama hutenaya veamoya alisaya anonaamia tusia kana yana haneanagiya aligahae. Kalaisima fali-mainea kolamoa alino hagelafi-latenea kemona aepaa hanea yafena nagoa veamoya alu aotage veale huya hu neamatayanagi ani veamoya ani kolafena Afa yane. huya huteteya kayonema hisuna yama nelamia Alu Aotage Avamumona hu-haviya hu neatayanagiya anonaamia aligahae. Mosese kahegi kema ali neatagayaya veamogamina amakaseya tusia havi kayo aligahae.
Hageno Yisasia nagoene mage hie “Tamaipamoa falu nehinagetama maiho. Nenafaa hu-na-tenea augafa kava huna nagaya tamakaila hu-nela-matoe.” huno hie.

Anima Anumayamo kehena havigegeyama nehaya vayamoya mukia yafe Otahaiya yane. huya kalu kalu kea nevaigeno amaipamoa haviya nehigeya amakaiami amaugafa age hamaye nehaya yaamihena maiya huge huge nehuya ala kenake nehuya amakaiami amakia alisaga nehuya tamakaiteti nagoa yama alisaya yafena tamakaifena Tahaiya veane mainae. huya tamaipafi ayegegahe nehae.

Naa higeno mukia ma mopafi mainaya sauve vayayagaene kava vayayagaene ati vayate kava vayayagaene miyaamimo hai-mainea veanene tokiyaamima hanea vayaene nofipi maineya miya oali aliya nealiya veanene amakaiami aliyaamile nemaiya veanene tusia amamayo aigeya “Hanate maisune.” huya huteya yafakapiene agoyafi hanea ala yafakefamo akavelega faleya mo falakiya mainae.
