Tamafu-tamakanagamima tamakua amamigahena tamagelafa hutama amamiho. Kefo kavala tamakaveno hutetama kanale kava hisaya yamaage atafa hutama tokiya vaiho.

Hai-mainaa anayufina tusia imila aliteno ani ala kumakefa teniafi (10) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti ani imimoa nago kaiyaga ali haviya higeno seveni tausenia veane (7,000) hamaegeya fali hano humaine. Naa hu-mainayafe ofaliyama afaa mainaya veamoya tusia koli huteya ikapinagama mainea Anumaya Koti agia alisaga humainae.

Hamapaiyanagi amunoamifi mainea kanomoa aote aote mainaya vayamogami amunoamifi maineanagi nayona Anumaya Kotia hulokiya vaimalenea kema Apalahamuna hapaigahena nagoke kano hutegeno me haopainegi tusia ala kema hanea yafe Anumaya Kotia agaia nagoke kano maineanagino avate uno hapaimaine.

Ohigeno Pailatia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya naa higeka nagelela noaline? Nagaya tokiyaniene kanogina ‘Kina nopitila atalegahae.’ hunama hisuana afaa katalegahae. ‘Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.’ hunama hisuana ania hu-ga-tegahae. Kagaya mani kea nohavino?” huno havige.

Anima Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenea kema hapalia kemoa mage huno humaine “Sipi sipi haegahema avaleya nevagenoma avovoma ohuno ako huno nemaiya avameteene sipi sipi nafaneyagama ayolagefama laga hugahema hia kanomote mo hetiya maineya avovoma ohunaya avamete kava huno ke ohuno ako huno maine.
Evayi higeya “Ala sauve kanotia lamio.” huya hageno Anumaya Kotia Solona amamine. Ani kanomona nefa agia Kisie. Penisamini nofi kano maineanagino Soloa fotia (40) kafu kava yagaimateneane.

Tamage kasagoya veanea ke ohavi veane mainae. Ani veanemoya kemona aepaa ohuya afa keage maiya nehuya havigeage yaamileti mukia veamogamina aye-mavataga nehae. Aniama nehaya veala nagoa kasagoya Yuta vayamoya Tamaugafa laga hiho. huya humainae.
Ageana ani yapina mukia yaka kafa afua osifavea nama vayupala yagaene mainageno elavi-maine.
Taagayama nagoke taaipalema maua kava huya nagoke amaipale maisaya yafe naminana tokiya hale yania ago amaminoe.

Naa huo huna hu-kavelina kahapai-mainoa kelamagea akave malo. Kagaya Yisasifena havika kagupi maleteka Yisasi Kalaisina kaipa amineka veafena kahau kayamopafi kahaisigeka kahapai-mainoa kea akave malo.
Yuta vayamogami mono kemoa mage humaine “Mukia kanalela mukia yana sese hutama ti faleho.” huno humaineane. Ani yafe sikisia (6) yafa ti keayola vani hataletia (100) lita hanea keayola anilela hane.
Tamakesa hao hinagetama kefo yama nehaya yana ataleho. Nagoamogatama Anumaya Kotifema ohaviya yafena tamakaye hino huna nehue.

Tamaugafa alitama ohaiho. Nago kanomo kema havinutamahena ako hutama kea oamakiho. Tamamena malelava hutama maiho. Nago kanomoa haviya hu-lamatesigetamahena tamakua neamitama tamamena male falu hutama maiho.

Ani veamoya nomoa atama nelea yapi mainaya veane kana huya havi kate uyafenagi ani veala amavayu hutama amaugafa aligatiho. Aligatitama nagoa vayamoya kefo yama nehaya kavafena Otahaiya kavale. hutama koli hutama kayetama mainetama tamahauna humateho.

Tagaya ago havimainone Anumaya Kotife hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya veamoya, Anumaya Kotina agaima haisia kava hisayafe ke huno agaialega amavaleno amatenea veamogamite, mukia falote hisia yana kanale yaene kana yaene Anumaya Kotia alino kanale huneamate.

Tamakaya Yisasima hulatenea yafena havitama tamakupi maletama atafa hulinaya kea mukia veamoya ago havimainaya yafena havitena tusia muse nehue. Kanale auava yamo aepaa havilama hutama nagoa kefo yamofe tamakesa ohavisae hunahe nehue.

Ani nopina kanileta yafana miyamaamoa hai-mainea yafateti talo hu-malenaya folamoa haneanagiya ani folamole kimamufa kana huno manaage yana negayaya folamoe. Anile Anumaya Kotia alino hagelafi-matenea kema hanea pokisia haneane. Ani pokisia kanileta yafateti talo hugagi-male pokisie. Ani pokisimo agupinaga Eloni ayopalema agusasi aye-mainea ayopaene Anumaya Kotia nayoma alino hagelafi-matenea kema kae-malenaya yafatalaene kanileta yafateti talo humale keayola haneane. Ani keayopina ikapinagati elavi-mainea kavemo agia manae huno haneane.

Naa humainegi tagaiti lagima alisaga hisuna kaana hanate hane? Omaletafa huno omalene. Mukia kahegi kema akave nemalona yateti tagia alisaga hisuno? Aao, tagaiti kanale kava huna yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno huotatenegi Yisasia hulatenea yafe havita tagupi maleta tametiti huna yateti hunelate. Ani lagima alisaga hisuna kaana omalene.

Nagaya Nenafa aguafina maugeno Nenafaa ania huno nagai naguafina mainea yafena havika kagupina nomalano? Tamaha-pai-mainoa kea nagesafiti kea tamaha-opainoe. Aao. Nenafaa nagai nagupi maineno agaia aliyamaa nealie.
Hageya melitalu humainaya veamoya “Tamage nehae.” huya hageya Yasi vayamoya mage hae “Kenaania ali hatata hutalenetama hegi kayoteti hanaeho.” huya hageya hanae-mainae.

Menia nagola ohavinaya kahegi kea tamaha-paigahugi haviho. Nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Amakaya ania huya tamakaifena hamaisie. Nagayama tamakaifema nahau nayamopafima nahaiya kava hutama nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Amakaya ania huya tamakaifena hamaisie.

Tagaya maa huta nehavune ma mopafi mainona taugafa yugu no kana hu-mainegi falisunagenoa ani nona fanane hisigeno Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga agola hanege hanege hisia no kana taugafa talo tala hulatene. Vayamoya ani nona amayatetila okinagi Anumaya Kotia agaia kimalene huta ago havimainone.

Yisasia tokiyaage ke hu-haleno mage hu-maine “Nagoa veamogatama nagaifema tamage nehie hutama tamakupi maletama tamametitima hisayana nagainigefena tamakupina maletama tamametitia hu-nona-tagi hu-na-tenea kanomofeene hu-nea-tae.

Hapaiyanagi Ananaiyasia mage huno humaine “Anumayaniamogae ani kanomofena mukia veamoya mage huya hagena nehavuane Yelusalemuma kagai anagama mainaya veamogamina tusiya huno ali haviya huneamate huya hagena havi-mainoe.

Ani kanafina maa hugahae. Veamoya amakaiamihekeya hamaugahie. Mone alisaya yafe aluya huno hamaugahie. Amakaiami amaugafa aliya haiteya Ala vaya mainone. huya hugahae. Anumaya Kotiene anagaamoyaenefena hu haviya humategahae. Itaamo-afoamogami kea ali hipoya ohugahae. Nagoa yafena huya musena ohuya kefo kavaage maiya hugahae.

Agaia kolamaaleti kefo yama humainona anonatia aligeno Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulateteno nagoene taya huno kefo yama nehuna yana Anumaya Kotia hai vaino anonatia tamigahe hianagi Yisasima falimainea yateti tagai anona ago alimaineafe tagu tamena aligatigahie.
Anumayanimoa Yisasiene ailokaena mainena ago havilinoe nagoa kavemoa oniyaage ohune. Nago kanomoma agaia agu agesafima “Oniyaage humaine.” huno havisia kavemoa oniyaage haumaine.

Timotigae kahapai-mainoa kema kafu-kagana-gamina hamapaisanana Yisasi Kalaisina kanale aliya kanoa maigane. Yisasifema havika kagupi maleka kametitima nehana kemoa hagaage hinageka akavema malesanana tokiyaage kano maigane.
